description: A local slave-lord is seeking absolution for his sins. He has donated all his virgins and a chest of gold to your cause.

name: The tax collectors did a magnificent job
description: The tax collectors did a magnificent job and managed to tax the hidden reserves of the local lords.

description: A market was held in the province. Merchants from far and wide gathered and there was much commerce.

name: A wealthy merchant from a distant land h
description: A wealthy merchant from a distant land has married his daughter to a prominent priest of the faith. A pile of gold and a remarkable item were accepted as offerings by the temple.

name: A priest of the faith has been blessing
description: A priest of the faith has been blessing the crops throughout the province. People are happy, faith has increased and much wealth has been donated by merry farmers.

name: A priest of the faith has been preaching
description: A priest of the faith has been preaching and warning people of the end of the world. People are frightened and come to the temples to seek comfort. Faith has increased and much wealth has been donated to the temple.

name: A wealthy merchant has donated a sculptu
description: A wealthy merchant has donated a sculpture of solid gold to the temple.

name: A famous circus has been touring in the
description: A famous circus has been touring in the province. This resulted in extra taxes in addition to the good luck that a circus always brings.

name: A freak show with local talents has gain
description: A freak show with local talents has gained fame and is now known throughout the neighboring provinces as well. People are proud of their misfits and taxes have increased.

name: Playful winds have been captured, distil
description: Playful winds have been captured, distilled into diamonds and transported to your laboratory by your mages.

name: Playful winds have been captured, distil
description: Playful winds have been captured, distilled into diamonds by your mages.

name: A spring fairy has been sighted, spreadi
description: A spring fairy has been sighted, spreading joy and laughter in the land.

name: The summer heat has been distilled into
description: The summer heat has been distilled into glowing rubies by a young mage.

name: This summer is unusually hot. In the ash
description: This summer is unusually hot. In the ashes of a burning bush a small amount of gems were found.

name: This summer is unusually hot. In the ash
description: This summer is unusually hot. In the ashes of a burning bush a small amount of gems were found.

name: Fallen leaves and magic gems have been f
description: Fallen leaves and magic gems have been found in a badger's den.

description: Heavy autumn rains caused a landslide, revealing a buried cache of magic gems underneath the soil.

name: Heavy autumn rains caused a landslide, r
description: Heavy autumn rains caused a landslide, revealing a buried cache of magic gems underneath the soil.

name: A few ice crystals of fantastical propor
description: A few ice crystals of fantastical proportions have fallen in the province.

name: The hard working farmers of the province
description: The hard working farmers of the province managed to harvest some sturdy crops even during winter. The farmers were overjoyed and managed to pay some extra tax as well.

name: The hard working farmers of the province
description: The hard working farmers of the province managed to harvest some sturdy crops even during winter. The farmers were overjoyed and managed to pay some extra tax as well.

name: A mild winter has enabled your traders t
description: A mild winter has enabled your traders to travel extensively and livestock to survive the winter.

description: A young farmer stealing food from squirrels found some gems among the acorns and donated them to the temple.

description: A handful of magic fire gems were found by digging in a spot where the snow would not settle.

name: A handful of magic gems have been found
description: A handful of magic gems have been found in a grove in the forest.

name: A renegade wizard was found and hanged f
description: A renegade wizard was found and hanged from an oak. His laboratory along with a handful of nature gems are now yours.

name: A spirit was found fettered in the split
description: A spirit was found fettered in the split trunk of an ancient oak and offered some magic gems in return for its release.

name: A handful of magic gems have been found

description: A handful of magic gems have been found in an abandoned mine.

description: Silver deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

description: Gold deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

name: Ore deposits have been found and a boost
description: Ore deposits have been found and a boost in army production is expected.

name: A handful of magic gems were found in th
description: A handful of magic gems were found in the belly of a dead whale.

name: Some magic gems were found in wreck of a
description: Some magic gems were found in wreck of a sunken ship

name: Magical clams were found and harvested f
description: Magical clams were found and harvested for pearls

name: A grand festival was held in your honor.
description: A grand festival was held in your honor. Everyone was celebrating and faith has increased in the province.

name: A celebrant of the faith is preaching ju
description: A celebrant of the faith is preaching justice and bringing hope to the people.

name: A pilgrim from a distant land has come t
description: A pilgrim from a distant land has come to witness miracles in your temple.

name: A local lord has employed slave labor an
description: A local lord has employed slave labor and resource production in the province has been greatly improved.

name: The people here have raised a temple in
description: The people here have raised a temple in honor of their God.

name: A local lord has built a fortress to def
description: A local lord has built a fortress to defend his lands from revolting peasants.

name: A magic item has been found and transpor
description: A magic item has been found and transported to the arcane laboratory.

name: An unknown benefactor donated a gold sta
description: An unknown benefactor donated a gold statue crafted in your honor to the local temple. It was swiftly melted and stamped into gold coins.

name: An unknown benefactor donated a gold sta
description: An unknown benefactor donated a gold statue crafted in your honor to the local temple. Placing it outside the temple has increased faith and order.

name: Peasants speak of ill omens and strange
description: Peasants speak of ill omens and strange creatures that prowl the forests at night. A handful of death gems have been found in the belly of a goat.

name: A witch was drowned in the well of a vil
description: A witch was drowned in the well of a village. Thereafter the water has started glowing in the moonlight. This esoteric substance has been distilled into a large quantity of gems.

name: Priests of the temple have found ancient
description: Priests of the temple have found ancient and forgotten vaults containing rich offerings.

name: A gold nugget of legendary size has been
description: A gold nugget of legendary size has been found and brought to the treasury.

name: A peasants goose has laid several eggs o
description: A peasants goose has laid several eggs of gold! Unfortunately it was killed in an ensuing conflict of ownership. The gold eggs were confiscated by the temple to end the conflict.

name: A peasants oyster has produced several g
description: A peasants oyster has produced several giant pearls! Unfortunately the oyster was smashed in an ensuing conflict of ownership. The pearls were confiscated by the temple to end the conflict.

name: Adventurers have plundered the lair of a
description: Adventurers have plundered the lair of a hideous troll. Their leader has been hanged and all unlawfully acquired goods have been confiscated.

name: The local merchants guild has erected a
description: The local merchants guild has erected a glorious temple in your honor. Unfortunately costs were higher than expected and tax money had to be used for the last fittings. Consequently the province has not been able to pay any tax this month.

name: The skull of a legendary mage has been u
description: The skull of a legendary mage has been unearthed and transported to the lab. [Skull Mentor]

name: A limping man in a black coat has appear
description: A limping man in a black coat has appeared at the gates of the local stronghold. He offers a deal for any commander willing to sign his contract in blood. [Soul Contract]

name: An adventurer returning from ruins deep
description: An adventurer returning from ruins deep in the mountains has returned insane, carrying a magical lantern that the lord of the land immediately sent to the treasury. [Lightless Lantern]

name: An adventurer returning from the deep se
description: An adventurer returning from the deep seas has returned insane, carrying a magical lantern that the lord of the land immediately sent to the treasury. [Lightless Lantern]

name: A cunning wizard has donated a magical o
description: A cunning wizard has donated a magical object to the local lord in return for protection against the superstitious peasantry. It was immediately transported to the treasury.

name: Much of the recent unrest was probably c
description: Much of the recent unrest was probably caused by an unpopular local baron. He was executed and wealth including a magic item was confiscated.

name: The construction of a new ring wall to d
description: The construction of a new ring wall to defend a major city is complete. People from near and far are gathering to seek comfort and commerce in the city. Tax revenues have been permanently increased.

name: One of your administrators fears a revol
description: One of your administrators fears a revolution.

name: A prudent administrator fears your neigh
description: A prudent administrator fears your neighbors.

name: One of your bailiffs is afraid of monste
description: One of your bailiffs is afraid of monsters.

name: An annoying leprechaun was captured by a
description: An annoying leprechaun was captured by a simple cobbler who sold him to you for a little gold. When persuaded with burning iron, the leprechaun revealed the location of his treasure trove. A magic item and a pile of gold coins were found underneath a dung heap.

name: A great treasure has been found! A fortu
description: A great treasure has been found! A fortune in gold, one magic item and a huge amount of magic gems have been found and transported to the arcane laboratory.

name: A great caravan from a distant land arri
description: A great caravan from a distant land arrived in the province. Merchants from far and wide gathered and there was much commerce.

name: A great market was held in the province.
description: A great market was held in the province. Merchants from far and wide gathered and there was much commerce.

name: Ravagus, the Master of Flames, has sent
description: Ravagus, the Master of Flames, has sent his man-born son to serve you. In return he expects you to set the world on fire.
effects: nation -2|1com Fire Lord|2d6units Will o' the Wisp|2d6units Magma Child

name: A helpful necromancer has decided to aid
description: A helpful necromancer has decided to aid you. He brought his soulless minions with him.

name: Rumors of your reputation and promises o
description: Rumors of your reputation and promises of an eternal afterlife has caused an amazon priestess from a distant land to lead her tribe to you. In return for service. They expect you to display your mastery over death itself.

name: One of your commanders found an old dung
description: One of your commanders found an old dungeon guarded by strange seals. After days of arcane studies, the seals were broken and a wizened old man was released. The old lore master gratefully accepted you as his new master in return for his freedom.

name: Your path to ascension has been foreseen
description: Your path to ascension has been foreseen at the Grey Tower of Nexus and one of the Shadow Seers has been given the task of guiding you.

name: One of your gardeners has been feeding t
description: One of your gardeners has been feeding the royal gardens with the blood of animals and condemned criminals. Unaware of the danger to himself, he entered the tainted garden and was killed by the awakened vines. For a week no one dared enter the gardens, but then a strange wanderer of the woods arrived and proclaimed that he would tame the garden, should he be made royal gardener. Now, both he and the dark vines serve you with the strength of the bloodthirsty wild.

name: A fugitive from the hidden kingdom of El
description: A fugitive from the hidden kingdom of Elludia has arrived in your capital. He brings with him a handful of diamonds and swears to serve if you protect him from his former masters.

name: An emissary from the Shadow Seers of Nex
description: An emissary from the Shadow Seers of Nexus has arrived in the province. He brings you three gifts from the hidden tower: Astral pearls, a magic item and a pot filled with gold coins.

name: An enormously wealthy prince from a dist
description: An enormously wealthy prince from a distant land arrived in your province searching for his beloved lady. Unfortunately for him, he was infected by the plague and died in your care. His riches, a fortune in gold and a number of magic items, were confiscated and transported to your treasury.

name: Oleg, an incredibly old alchemist workin
description: Oleg, an incredibly old alchemist working in one of your laboratories has managed to construct a huge device that transforms base metals into gold. Unfortunately, he died from heart attack when the device actually worked. The device is operational and produces one hundred pounds of gold per month.

name: An unnatural plague has swept the provin
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since.

name: Caspar of the Cave has arrived in your p
description: Caspar of the Cave has arrived in your province and told you where to find the deepest cave in the province. Unfortunately he also awakened some strange beings in the deeps.

name: A young scholar has discovered the tomb
description: A young scholar has discovered the tomb of an ancient king.

name: The tomb of an ancient priest-king was d
description: The tomb of an ancient priest-king was discovered.

name: An old scholar has discovered the tomb o
description: An old scholar has discovered the tomb of an ancient hero, holding ancient treasures.

name: The tomb of an ancient king was discover
description: The tomb of an ancient king was discovered by a young scholar. Ignoring the glyphs of warning, he entered the tomb and claimed an artifact of old. Unfortunately, he also released the guardians of the tomb!.
effects: magicitem 3|1com Spectral Mage|8d6units Longdead|4d6units Longdead Horseman

name: A wealthy merchant has found salvation a
description: A wealthy merchant has found salvation and donated a huge sum of gold to the temple.

name: A wealthy merchant has been suffering fr
description: A wealthy merchant has been suffering from a dread disease and donated all his gold to get rid of the affliction.

name: A wealthy and faithful noble has died fr
description: A wealthy and faithful noble has died from old age and willed his fortunes to the Awakening God. The gold was collected by the temple.

name: A tribal king from a distant land has do
description: A tribal king from a distant land has donated a golden plow and a magic item to the Awakening God.

name: There was a trade boom in the province.
description: There was a trade boom in the province.

name: A great fertility festival was celebrate
description: A great fertility festival was celebrated in the province.

name: A great summer festival was celebrated i
description: A great summer festival was celebrated in the province.

name: A great harvest festival was celebrated
description: A great harvest festival was celebrated in the province. Faith has increased and bumper harvests are expected.

name: Instead of falling off, the leaves on an
description: Instead of falling off, the leaves on an ancient oak turned into gems.

name: Midwinter was celebrated in the province
description: Midwinter was celebrated in the province.

name: One cold winter night there was a storm.
description: One cold winter night there was a storm. A man with a frozen beard and robes of silver and ice emerged. He claimed to be the last of his order and now he wishes to serve the one whose dominion is ice and darkness.

name: An old hut was found in a deep forest. T
description: An old hut was found in a deep forest. The owner, an old animist, preferred to serve rather than being staked in a bog.

name: The cousin of a local lord has been bitt
description: The cousin of a local lord has been bitten by a werewolf and now wishes your protection from the superstitious peasantry. He has donated his gold to the treasury.

name: A vampire that has been rooted out of hi
description: A vampire that has been rooted out of his nest by local fanatics now seeks your protection.

name: A Vampire Count has been driven from his
description: A Vampire Count has been driven from his lands by local fanatics and now seeks your protection.

name: Gold deposits have been found and a new
description: Gold deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

name: Gold deposits have been found and a new
description: Gold deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

name: An old tower surrounded by wisps of mist
description: An old tower surrounded by wisps of mist was found on a high mountaintop. The owner of the tower agreed to help you for a small sum of gold and a couple of virgins.

name: A large amount of magic gems have floate
description: A large amount of magic gems have floated ashore in this province.

name: A slave ship has been discovered and the
description: A slave ship has been discovered and the cargo confiscated. Several virgins were transported to your blood slave dungeons.

name: A pirate ship has been discovered and th
description: A pirate ship has been discovered and the cargo confiscated.

name: A wayward siren was found by a lonely fi
description: A wayward siren was found by a lonely fisherman. He helped her mend her broken wing and gained her trust. Being a man of faith, he converted her and she is now willing to serve you.

name: A sunken ship filled with treasure has b
description: A sunken ship filled with treasure has been discovered in a deep gorge. All its wealth has been transported to your treasury.

name: A black sunken ship has been discovered
description: A black sunken ship has been discovered in a deep gorge. The ship contained a huge amount of magic gems and two magic items.

name: A large amount of magic water gems has b
description: A large amount of magic water gems has been found in the deeps.

name: A triton prince has come to you in searc
description: A triton prince has come to you in search of the fabled Orb of Atlantis. He was so impressed by your wondrous palaces that he and his retinue swore their allegiance to you.
effects: nation -2|1com Amber Clan Mage|1com Amber Clan Priest|3d6units Amber Clan Guard|6d6units Amber Clan Triton

name: A hydromancer from the Academy Underneat
description: A hydromancer from the Academy Underneath has arrived with great gifts. He is on a secret mission, but has agreed to help you.

name: A triton mage from the Forest of Amber K
description: A triton mage from the Forest of Amber Kelp has arrived with his menagerie. He was attacked by sea trolls and is now seeking refuge in your lands.
effects: nation -2|1com Amber Clan Mage|3d6units Sea Stag

name: An envoy from the Cerulean Maharajah has
description: An envoy from the Cerulean Maharajah has arrived with sad news. The Maharajah is dying and his one hundred and seven sons are gathering to attend his funeral. One of your Cerulean Warriors has left your service, apparently being one of the heirs. In gratitude he left a bag of gold for your treasury and his personal advisor to serve you.

name: Azazel has sired an offspring.
description: Azazel has sired an offspring.

name: Semyaza has sired an offspring.
description: Semyaza has sired an offspring.

name: Ezekiel has sired an offspring.
description: Ezekiel has sired an offspring.

name: Shamshiel has sired an offspring.
description: Shamshiel has sired an offspring.

name: Kokabel has sired an offspring.
description: Kokabel has sired an offspring.

name: Arakiel has sired an offspring.
description: Arakiel has sired an offspring.

name: One of your Melqarts has realized the po
description: One of your Melqarts has realized the power inherent in the blood of his brethren. Inviting a Ba'al to a grisly banquet, he slew his guest and feasted upon his heart to gain power.

name: One of your Zamzummim and an Adon have o
description: One of your Zamzummim and an Adon have organized a great banquet for Ditan, greatest of the deified Rephaite Lords. By sacrificing himself at the feast, the Zamzummite has traded life for life and passed into Sheol, allowing Ditan and his assembly to manifest in the world of the living.

name: One of your eunuchs has miraculously fat
description: One of your eunuchs has miraculously fathered a child. Faith in your healing powers has increased.

name: One of your Ceremonial Masters has inter
description: One of your Ceremonial Masters has interpreted the ceremonial calendar of the Ministry.

name: One of your Ministers has interpreted th
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province.

name: One of your Ministers has interpreted th
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province.

name: One of your Ministers has interpreted th
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province. Order was brought to the troubled province.

name: Farbaute has organized a great drinking
description: Farbaute has organized a great drinking contest and champions from near and far are gathering to show off.

name: A handful of black onis were molesting a
description: A handful of black onis were molesting a group of red onis and refused to stop. Not until Tsunekage slew one of the black onis and ate his heart did they stop. Another group of red onis witnessed the event and joined your army.
requirements: monster Devourer of Demons|chaos 1|monster Aka-Oni|monster Kuro-Oni|land 1

name: Daidalos, the great inventor, Maker of t
description: Daidalos, the great inventor, Maker of the Maze, has unveiled his latest masterpiece, an army of mechanical servants. A clever engineer quickly found a use for the servants and placed armaments in their hands.

name: The Mother of Monsters has given birth.
description: The Mother of Monsters has given birth.

name: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of mons
description: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of monsters, has given birth to a great serpent of exceptional cunning.

name: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of mons
description: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of monsters, has given birth to a great wolf of exceptional cunning.

name: Klaus has convinced the Emperor of Pythi
description: Klaus has convinced the Emperor of Pythium that he needs further funding to conquer the Underworld. The Emerald Emperor sent a Pythian legion and a chest filled with gold to strengthen the human position in the Underworld.

name: In her misery and solitude, Delgnat, the
description: In her misery and solitude, Delgnat, the last Partholonian, has reenacted the last battle of Sera, her father. Some of the corpses reanimated for the charade were not destroyed and have been put to other use.
effects: nation -2|3d6units Longdead Partholonian|4d6units Longdead Horseman|6d6units Soulless

name: A brigand leader and his followers have
description: A brigand leader and his followers have been rounded up and delivered to one of your bailiffs by a striking woman astride a unicorn. Peasants are now able to toil the land again.

name: One of your Knights of the Stone has emb
description: One of your Knights of the Stone has embarked upon a quest and returned with enchanted treasure.

name: One of your Knights of the Stone has emb
description: One of your Knights of the Stone has embarked upon a quest. In a deep forest he met an enchantress of great power, fell in love with her and wooed her for a month. Being quite lonely, she grew fond of him and accepted his offer of marriage.

name: A wave of religious zeal has swept the p
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the province and a group of lowborn soldiers committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: Your troubled province has been terroriz

description: A wave of human immigrants has swept in from a neighboring province. They were herded into a valley, enslaved and equipped with crude spears and slings.

name: A Nabi has emerged in one of your provin
description: A Nabi has emerged in one of your provinces with a band of Levite zealots, preaching the Word of God.

name: Strange lights have appeared in the dark
description: Strange lights have appeared in the dark depths and a host of Deep Ones has emerged to gorge on fish and tritons.

name: An influential Coral Queen has opened th
description: An influential Coral Queen has opened the gates to her coral castle. Atlantians from near and far have gathered to hear her sermons. A large number of them decided to heed her call and take up arms for the Awakening God.

name: The Once and Future Queen has entered a
description: The Once and Future Queen has entered a ruined basalt city of the deeps and shattered the dark crystal at its center, freeing the sleeping pillars bound by its eerie lights.

name: A reclusive and singularly powerful Mind
description: A reclusive and singularly powerful Mind Lord has decided to release his slaves to fight for your cause. A group of powerful slave trolls has joined your armies.

name: A reclusive and singularly powerful Mind
description: A reclusive and singularly powerful Mind Lord has decided to release his slaves to fight for your cause. A host of enslaved mermen has joined your armies.

name: The Council of Three has decided to work
description: The Council of Three has decided to work with you. The ancient starspawns have allowed some of their enslaved Atlantians to join your armies. They also gave you a strange artifact.

name: A wave of religious zeal has swept the o
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the ocean and a group of warriors committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: A sectarian movement has emerged in the
description: A sectarian movement has emerged in the province. Their false prophet is preaching and gathering his flock. Faith will decrease until you root them out.

name: A brigand leader has emerged in the prov
description: A brigand leader has emerged in the province, uniting the robbers and leading them on daring raids against your tax collectors. Unrest will increase until you root him out.

name: Brigands have taken up residence in a ru
description: Brigands have taken up residence in a ruin.

name: People here are very unruly and have des
description: People here are very unruly and have destroyed valuable equipment that is necessary for us.

name: The people have revolted and you have lo
description: The people have revolted and you have lost control of this province.

name: Merchants have established themselves in
description: Merchants have established themselves in your temple. Faith is decreasing, but the merchants prosper.

name: A large group of people have started to
description: A large group of people have started to worship a false pretender. The leaders of the group were swiftly killed, but faith has decreased and unrest is rising.

name: People are starting to worship false pre
description: People are starting to worship false pretenders in the secrecy of their homes.

name: Your temple has been vandalized, several
description: Your temple has been vandalized, several statues have been smashed.

name: An earthquake has struck, killing many p
description: An earthquake has struck, killing many people and destroying our temple.

name: An earthquake has struck, killing many p
description: An earthquake has struck, killing many people and destroying our temple.

name: A fire has destroyed the arcane laborato
description: A fire has destroyed the arcane laboratory.

name: A very ill omen was seen and rumors of i
description: A very ill omen was seen and rumors of it have spread through the entire province.

name: An omen that spoke of the decline of the
description: An omen that spoke of the decline of the god was seen and rumors of it have spread widely.

name: Suddenly Bogus and his fellow adventurer
description: Suddenly Bogus and his fellow adventurers decided to aid an old wise man whose daughter was held captive by your blood mages. The young girl and a couple of other blood slaves were liberated in a daring attack on your dungeon.

name: Children are disappearing at night. Stra
description: Children are disappearing at night. Strange creatures skulk the wilderness.

name: A charismatic preacher has appeared, car
description: A charismatic preacher has appeared, carrying the word of a rival pretender who now has dominion of the land.

name: A local sect has flourished. Their leade
description: A local sect has flourished. Their leader preaches that labor is for the wicked.

name: A vengeful crone has cursed the land
description: A vengeful crone has cursed the land

name: Strange events are occurring and superst
description: Strange events are occurring and superstition among the commoners is increasing.

name: People here are suddenly very restless a
description: People here are suddenly very restless and a substantial part of the population has left their homes in search of adventure and a better place to live.

name: Famine has struck the land. People are s
description: Famine has struck the land. People are starving and begging in the streets, blaming their cruel masters.

name: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabi
description: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabins and rotting corpses litter the landscape.

name: A vengeful witch has cursed some of your
description: A vengeful witch has cursed some of your troops after they destroyed her home and took her magical gems.

name: A barbarian horde has unexpectedly attac
description: A barbarian horde has unexpectedly attacked and pillaged our province.

name: A group of knights has unexpectedly atta
description: A group of knights has unexpectedly attacked the province in an attempt to take control.

description: A group of tritons has unexpectedly attacked the province in an attempt to take control.

description: A huge barbarian horde has unexpectedly attacked and pillaged the province.
effects: 1com Barbarian Chief|16d6units Barbarian|1com Barbarian Lord|4d6units Barbarian|kill 20

name: An evil necromancer and his host suddenl
description: An evil necromancer and his host suddenly attacked the province in search of magical resources.

name: Magic is fading.
description: Magic is fading.

name: A large group of non faithfuls have deci
description: A large group of non faithfuls have decided to emigrate. Part of the population has left their homes in search of a better place to live and faith has increased in the rightful god.

name: People here are very displeased and a su
description: People here are very displeased and a substantial part of the population has left their homes in search of a better place to live.

description: Woods of the fairy court have been burned by a local lord.

description: Local lords are feuding.

description: Diarrhea has spread among the militia.

name: Warring tribes cause unrest. Part of the
description: Warring tribes cause unrest. Part of the population has been killed in the raids.

description: A festival celebrating the resurrection of a local fertility god was held in the province. Faith is decreasing, but the crops seems to grow quicker.

name: Spring floods have destroyed crops and b
description: Spring floods have destroyed crops and buildings.

name: A harvest festival was held in the provi
description: A harvest festival was held in the province. During the festival a huge number of goats were sacrificed to a local bloodthirsty deity. Faith is decreasing, but the harvest was very good and tax collection increased.

name: A fairy court of summer has been traveli
description: A fairy court of summer has been traveling through the land. Growth and luck have increased but frolicking peasants have left the fields untended, causing a fall in productivity.

name: A strange kind of purple and poisonous m
description: A strange kind of purple and poisonous mushroom seems to thrive in the province. Unfortunately livestock like eating it and many animals have died.

name: Bad harvest.
description: Bad harvest.

name: Heavy snowfalls have blocked important t
description: Heavy snowfalls have blocked important trade routes.

name: The harsh winter has killed many poor fo
description: The harsh winter has killed many poor folks.

name: The wolves are hungry this winter and lo
description: The wolves are hungry this winter and locals are being attacked and killed by the score.

name: Numerous sharks have caused widespread p
description: Numerous sharks have caused widespread panic in the sea.

name: A hurricane has struck the land, devasta
description: A hurricane has struck the land, devastating the coastline.

name: Raiders from the sea are harrying coasta
description: Raiders from the sea are harrying coastal settlements.

name: Heavy snowfalls have blocked important m
description: Heavy snowfalls have blocked important mountain roads.

name: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabi
description: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabins and rotting corpses litter the landscape.

description: Famine has struck the land. People are starving and begging in the streets. Many have died and the people are blaming their cruel masters for their suffering.

name: A blight has struck the land. People are
description: A blight has struck the land. People are starving and begging in the streets.

name: A hailstorm has devastated the countrysi
description: A hailstorm has devastated the countryside, killing cattle and shepherds.

description: Young raging rebels have started riots and uprisings in the province. Everyone is on the edge, ready to kill and plunder.

name: An enormous earthquake has struck! Later
description: An enormous earthquake has struck! Later, when the earth settled, horrible monsters appeared from the cracks in the ground.

name: A heatwave has struck the land. Drought
description: A heatwave has struck the land. Drought is expected

name: A demon has possessed a herd of swine an
description: A demon has possessed a herd of swine and ravaged the province for a week.

name: Careless containment of your fire gems h
description: Careless containment of your fire gems has caused a conflagration in your laboratory. Fortunately you could harvest a large number of fire gems from the smoldering embers.

description: A magical disaster has destroyed your lab.

description: A thief has stolen some of your magic gems.

description: A thief has stolen some of your magic gems.

description: A thief has stolen some of your magic gems.

description: A thief has stolen some of your magic gems.

description: A thief has stolen some of your magic pearls.

description: Undisciplined jailers have defiled your blood slaves.

name: A master thief has stolen many of your m
description: A master thief has stolen many of your magic gems.

name: Magic is fading.
description: Magic is fading.

name: Magic is fading.
description: Magic is fading.

name: A disaster while researching resulted in
description: A disaster while researching resulted in a lost eye for one of your mages.

name: A disaster while researching resulted in
description: A disaster while researching resulted in an explosion that tore off an arm from one of your mages.

name: A disaster while researching resulted in
description: A disaster while researching resulted in one of your mages getting a severe chest wound.

name: Villains have tried to seize control of
description: Villains have tried to seize control of the province.

name: A group of visiting heroes have decided
description: A group of visiting heroes have decided to rid this province of its unfair rulership.

name: An assassin tried to eliminate one of th
description: An assassin tried to eliminate one of the commanders.

name: A stealthy ninja tried to eliminate one
description: A stealthy ninja tried to eliminate one of the commanders.

name: A large group of ronin has tried to seiz
description: A large group of ronin has tried to seize control of the province.

name: The people have been led astray by the p
description: The people have been led astray by the prophets of a false god.

name: A sect of dark cultists have grown influ
description: A sect of dark cultists have grown influential and now claim dominion of the province in the name of the Lord of Death!

name: A traveling sorceror was staked by upset
description: A traveling sorceror was staked by upset peasants. Before his death he cursed the land and everyone in it.

name: The local lawman has been found frolicki
description: The local lawman has been found frolicking with faeries in the wilderness instead of carrying out his duties.

name: A grotesque idol has been unearthed. The
description: A grotesque idol has been unearthed. The locals are rumored to pay it offerings when the moon is dark. You no longer have dominion of the land.

name: For a few days the animals seemed determ
description: For a few days the animals seemed determined to cause bad luck. Snakes and rabbits were crossing peoples paths all the time.

name: Locust swarms are eating the crops and c
description: Locust swarms are eating the crops and causing widespread panic.

name: Hordes of peasants have left their homes
description: Hordes of peasants have left their homes in search of a better place to live.

name: A hurricane has struck the land, devasta
description: A hurricane has struck the land, devastating the countryside.

name: A horrible tempest has struck the land.
description: A horrible tempest has struck the land. The servants of Pazuzu could be heard bellowing in the storm. Unrest has increased

name: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabi
description: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabins and rotting corpses litter the landscape.

name: A blizzard has struck the province, kill
description: A blizzard has struck the province, killing animals and young. The heavy snowfalls hampered trade and production.

name: Insect swarms are eating the crops and a
description: Insect swarms are eating the crops and annoying the populace.

name: A volcano has erupted in the province. S
description: A volcano has erupted in the province. Survivors have fled the devastation.

name: Toads have fallen from the skies. The om
description: Toads have fallen from the skies. The omen has upset the populace.

name: Trolls living under bridges have killed
description: Trolls living under bridges have killed and eaten travelers.

name: One of your researchers discovered somet
description: One of your researchers discovered something so unspeakable that he turned mute.

name: A well known count has revealed himself
description: A well known count has revealed himself as a vampire. He and his minions have tried to take control over the province.

name: A heatwave has struck the land. Many hav
description: A heatwave has struck the land. Many have died from drought and wildfires.

name: The temperature has dropped dramatically
description: The temperature has dropped dramatically and blizzards have devastated the land. Many have died from starvation.

name: A superstitious lord has rooted out witc
description: A superstitious lord has rooted out witches, wizards, mongrels, strangers and half-wits. All have been put to the pyre. Magic has decreased and a substantial portion of the populace has been lost.

name: War has broken out among the lords of th
description: War has broken out among the lords of the land. There is great turmoil and a large part of the population has been killed or fled.

name: The weather is getting increasingly cold
description: The weather is getting increasingly colder and an unseasonal winter is expected.

name: The temperature has dropped considerably
description: The temperature has dropped considerably and the winter is going to be the coldest ever!

name: Frost has destroyed the crops. Starvatio
description: Frost has destroyed the crops. Starvation is expected.

name: Rain has been pouring down and the entir
description: Rain has been pouring down and the entire province is severely flooded.

name: A Kraken King has come out of his old hi
description: A Kraken King has come out of his old hiding place and attacked the province.

name: Enemies of the faith have destroyed the
description: Enemies of the faith have destroyed the holy temple.

name: One of Skallhgg's viceroys has attacke
description: One of Skallhgg's viceroys has attacked our province.

name: A small but powerful shambler society ha
description: A small but powerful shambler society has decided to take control of the province.
effects: 1com Shambler Chief|4d6units War Shambler|2d6units War Shambler

name: A lonely Hydra is terrorizing the provin
description: A lonely Hydra is terrorizing the province. At night it shrieks in agonized solitude.

name: An enormous tidal wave has hit. Everyone
description: An enormous tidal wave has hit. Everyone living near the shore has died. People are very distraught.

name: A Troll King has unexpectedly attacked.
description: A Troll King has unexpectedly attacked.

name: Some ancient Power has been disturbed, t
description: Some ancient Power has been disturbed, turning everyone in the province into mindless plant beings!

name: A malicious druid and his companions are
description: A malicious druid and his companions are trying to take control of the land!
effects: 1com Ice Druid|4d6units Slinger|2d6units Ice Drake|3d6units Militia|addequip 1

name: A malicious druid and his companions are
description: A malicious druid and his companions are trying to take control of the land! Their aim is to restore it to growth and health.
effects: 1com Ice Druid|4d6units Slinger|2d6units Ice Drake|3d6units Militia|addequip 1

name: Realizing the power of the beautiful and
description: Realizing the power of the beautiful and ever growing nature, the entire female population of this province has gone into a frenzy of Pangaean worship!

name: A group of huge Scorpion Beasts are terr
description: A group of huge Scorpion Beasts are terrorizing the province.

name: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past
description: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past your temple guard and set the temple ablaze. An Abysian conspiracy is suspected.

name: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past
description: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past your temple guard and set some of your blood slaves free.

name: The people in the province have been awa
description: The people in the province have been awakened by the holy power of Marignon. They are now in a fanatic state and kill everything undead.

name: A group of drunken Yamabushi picked a fi
description: A group of drunken Yamabushi picked a fight with some of your Sohei. After a vicious brawl, one Sohei and one Yamabushi were dead.

name: One of your Revelers was found and slain
description: One of your Revelers was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Epoptes was found and slain
description: One of your Epoptes was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Heliodromii was found and sl
description: One of your Heliodromii was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Kohanim has discovered an Ab
description: One of your Kohanim has discovered an Abba in his army camp. The heretic was quickly caught and stoned to death.

name: A Melqart of prodigious appetite has dev
description: A Melqart of prodigious appetite has devoured one of your Rephaites.

name: A Rephaite of prodigious appetite has de
description: A Rephaite of prodigious appetite has devoured an Avvite charioteer along with his horses.

name: The chains of your Juggernaut burst when
description: The chains of your Juggernaut burst when it was being pulled uphill. It accidentally crushed a young member of the militia. The event was seen as an evil omen and faith in you has decreased.

name: Suddenly the Roc swooped down and flew a
description: Suddenly the Roc swooped down and flew away with one of your elephants.

name: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger a
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your bloodslaves.

name: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger a
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your bloodslaves.

name: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger a
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your bloodslaves.

name: The wailing of the blood fountain has dr
description: The wailing of the blood fountain has driven part of the population insane. Ten percent of the population has died.

name: Skgu was struck by a fell mood and hel
description: Skgu was struck by a fell mood and held a grisly banquet in honor of himself. The guests feasted upon some of your blood slaves.

name: Having waited for hundreds of years, Sk
description: Having waited for hundreds of years, Skgu was finally approached by his former lover. Filled with rage and lust and hunger, he slew her, ate her and mourned her by killing a significant part of the population.

name: Sporsnjall and his wolfriders have ravis
description: Sporsnjall and his wolfriders have ravished women all around the province. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Sporsnjall and his wolfriders have burne
description: Sporsnjall and his wolfriders have burned crop fields all around the province. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Cattle all around the province is being
description: Cattle all around the province is being attacked by wolves. Rumors claim that Sporsnjall, the Wolf Lord, is causing the trouble. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Your farmers have angered a vengeful ent
description: Your farmers have angered a vengeful entity of the wild. A monster boar is now ravaging the province. Farmers are afraid to enter their fields and refuse to work. Unrest is slowly growing. You must send a group of hunters to find the dire pig and slay it lest unrest will continue to rise.

name: Horrible dreams of vivisections and chil
description: Horrible dreams of vivisections and children flayed by their mothers are afflicting the population. Fear of a horror infestation is causing widespread panic.

name: The moon turned red for a night, an omen
description: The moon turned red for a night, an omen of misfortune. Luck has decreased worldwide.

name: One night there were three moons, a omen
description: One night there were three moons, a omen of great fortune to come. Luck has increased worldwide.

name: During nighttime green lights can be see
description: During nighttime green lights can be seen dancing in the sky and mages have reported a worldwide surge of magic.

name: For unknown reasons magic seems to be le
description: For unknown reasons magic seems to be leaking from the world.

name: A cluster of five stars could be seen sh
description: A cluster of five stars could be seen shining more brightly than usual for a week. This is interpreted as an omen of good luck and fertility.

name: The climate has grown unnaturally cold.
description: The climate has grown unnaturally cold. People fear the Rimtursar are awakening. Unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The sun seems to have grown larger and t
description: The sun seems to have grown larger and the climate unnaturally warm. Unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The moon hangs ripe and pregnant in the
description: The moon hangs ripe and pregnant in the sky. The fields and orchards share their bounties before the coming winter.

name: The stars are right for conjurations.
description: The stars are right for conjurations.

name: The stars are right for alterations.
description: The stars are right for alterations.

name: The stars are right for evocations.
description: The stars are right for evocations.

name: The stars are right for constructions.
description: The stars are right for constructions.

name: The stars are right for enchantments.
description: The stars are right for enchantments.

name: The stars are right for thaumaturgy.
description: The stars are right for thaumaturgy.

name: The stars are right for blood magic.
description: The stars are right for blood magic.

name: Word is spreading that Astrologers have
description: Word is spreading that Astrologers have spotted a comet headed straight for Earth!

name: A comet can be seen clearly in the sky,
description: A comet can be seen clearly in the sky, heading straight for Earth. Panic is spreading worldwide.

name: The comet has struck ##landname##! The i
description: The comet has struck ##landname##! The impact could be seen from the other side of the world. Luckily it hit in a remote area and even though half the province was devastated, most of the population survived. [Huge Crater]

name: The comet has struck ##landname##! The i
description: The comet has struck ##landname##! The impact could be seen from the other side of the world. The province has been devastated and most of the population annihilated. [Huge Crater]

name: For a single day all water had a tone of
description: For a single day all water had a tone of red, as if tainted by blood. This is obviously a very bad omen and unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The most malicious stars are ascendant.
description: The most malicious stars are ascendant. The celestial spheres are disturbed by singularly bad omens. The night winds carry gibbering messages from the cruel stars. The insane call out names they should not know and spiders spin webs in patterns that should not be.

name: A forgotten decree of the pantokrator ha
description: A forgotten decree of the pantokrator has suddenly taken effect. The decree of the almighty fills the usurper gods and their minions with terror. Faith in the new weakling gods is diminished all over the world.

name: A strange dark rent has appeared in the
description: A strange dark rent has appeared in the sky. Hope, Wonder and Magic drains away through it.

name: Strange occurrences plague all lands. Ch
description: Strange occurrences plague all lands. Children are being born with two heads, pots of gold are found laying about, hurricanes strike the coasts and strange and terrible beasts emerge to haunt the land.

name: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!
description: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!

name: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!
description: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!

name: A sunken treasure has been found!
description: A sunken treasure has been found!

name: A witch was caught. While suffering her
description: A witch was caught. While suffering her sentence of death by lapidation, she uttered a dark curse over the land.

name: A triton witch master was caught. While
description: A triton witch master was caught. While suffering his sentence of death staked on the shore of an island, he uttered a dark curse over the land.

name: A martyr has died. The faithful rejoice
description: A martyr has died. The faithful rejoice and flock to the temple.

name: A warlock has been caught red-handed. Hi
description: A warlock has been caught red-handed. His virgin followers are now kept in your dungeon.

name: Nature gems have been distilled from the
description: Nature gems have been distilled from the droppings of a magical beast

name: The local lawgiver has caught a traitor.
description: The local lawgiver has caught a traitor. After summary trial and execution his belongings have been confiscated.

name: A local wizard was found consorting with
description: A local wizard was found consorting with demons and -far worse- with rival nations. The foreign agent has been put under the axe and his lab plundered.

name: Crystallized urine from a magical beast
description: Crystallized urine from a magical beast has been found in the melting snow.

name: Crystallized urine from a magical beast
description: Crystallized urine from a magical beast has been found in the melting snow.

name: One of your lords is fond of hunting. Wh
description: One of your lords is fond of hunting. While on such an endeavor he stumbled upon the lair of a hideous troll. After having swiftly slain the creature, the brave nobleman ventured further into its lair. There he found, among rotting refuse, a small purse with a few smallish coins. He donated these to the benefit of the nation, but kept all the nice magic stuff for himself.

name: A stranger was washed ashore from the se
description: A stranger was washed ashore from the sea. He remembers nothing of his past, but seems to retain his formidable skills and has joined your cause.

name: Carnivorous apes are causing unrest in t
description: Carnivorous apes are causing unrest in the region.

name: A little known sect of carnivorous apes
description: A little known sect of carnivorous apes are sacrificing humans in the woods.

name: Humans have disappeared at night, never
description: Humans have disappeared at night, never to return.

name: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your p
description: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your power, sent a demon to slay one of your commanders.

name: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local hu
description: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local human sheriff to death.

name: Humans have been killed or driven from t
description: Humans have been killed or driven from the province in large numbers.

name: A demon summoned by local blood-cultists
description: A demon summoned by local blood-cultists has run amok.

name: A foreign tribe of apes have attacked th
description: A foreign tribe of apes have attacked the province. They seem to be capturing commoners and transporting them into the jungle for unknown -probably hideous- ends.
effects: nation 0|2com Bandar Warrior|4d6units Kala-Mukha Warrior|1com Kala-Mukha|kill 5

name: Volunteers have collected virgin humans
description: Volunteers have collected virgin humans for sacrifice.

name: Followers of the local blood cult have s
description: Followers of the local blood cult have summoned forest demons into your service.

name: People of the province are revolting aga
description: People of the province are revolting against the local practice of blood magic and have liberated some blood slaves.

name: A gang of vengeful rakshas has sought ou
description: A gang of vengeful rakshas has sought out one of your faithful devatas. Trying to slay him, the have attacked the province in force.

name: A wise old mage was rumored to have disc
description: A wise old mage was rumored to have discovered the secret of transmuting lead into gold. Alas, despite attempts of persuasion, he arrogantly refused to share his discoveries and was at last decapitated. His executors were surprised to find his loosened head still muttering. It has now been preserved and transported to the laboratory. [Skull Mentor]

name: An ancient guru has transcended. His sku
description: An ancient guru has transcended. His skull continues to provide wisdom and guidance and has been added to your collection of magic wonders. [Skull Mentor]

name: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local hu
description: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local human sheriff to death.

name: A little known sect of dark apes are sac
description: A little known sect of dark apes are sacrificing humans in the woods. It may be just a rumor.

name: An ancient guru has transcended. His sku
description: An ancient guru has transcended. His skull continues to provide wisdom and guidance and has been added to your collection of magic wonders. [Skull Mentor]

name: The carcass of a dead shambler washed as
description: The carcass of a dead shambler washed ashore during one of the worst storms in memory. The creatures skin was fashioned into a piece of armor. [Shambler Skin Armor]

name: An industrious clan has migrated into th
description: An industrious clan has migrated into the area. They mine for gold but are also making people angry with their bad ale-drinking habits and boisterous demeanor.

name: Magic is fading.
description: Magic is fading.

name: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very
description: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very air is crystallizing into gems of magic.

name: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very
description: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very sea is crystallizing into gems of magic.

name: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your p
description: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your power, has sent a demon to slay one of your commanders.

name: An alien being has been sighted, skulkin
description: An alien being has been sighted, skulking near sites of mystical power.

name: The wise ruler of the realm has invested
description: The wise ruler of the realm has invested in roads and bridges.

name: A law has been decreed against sodomy.
description: A law has been decreed against sodomy.

name: The tax collector has indulged in glutto
description: The tax collector has indulged in gluttonous orgies at the expense of the treasury.

name: A charismatic preacher of foreign faith
description: A charismatic preacher of foreign faith has turned many from the true God. Pogroms against the defectors have been initiated.

name: Epidemic dysentery is spreading.
description: Epidemic dysentery is spreading.

name: A harsh law against vagrancy has been de
description: A harsh law against vagrancy has been decreed.

name: The ruler of the province has been able
description: The ruler of the province has been able to enforce an existing law, giving the government monopoly on gambling.

name: A successful traders guild has moved the
description: A successful traders guild has moved their headquarters here.

name: A tribe of subterranean goblins have eme
description: A tribe of subterranean goblins have emerged. They are wealthy and spendthrift with their silver, but cause trouble wherever they go.

name: People have been investing in a pyramid
description: People have been investing in a pyramid game, that has now deflated.

name: One of your researchers stumbled upon an
description: One of your researchers stumbled upon an ancient skin-bound tome and read a passage aloud. Unfortunately all those who happened to listen have been cursed for the rest of their miserable lives.

name: Some of your followers were sent to retr
description: Some of your followers were sent to retrieve the rumored riches of an ancient tomb situated in the eastern parts of this realm. They returned, carrying a meager sum of gold, cursed by its undead wardens.

name: Miasmatic fumes have risen from the swam
description: Miasmatic fumes have risen from the swamp, bringing pestilence to those living or traveling in the surrounding area.

name: A failed experiment caused a fire in the
description: A failed experiment caused a fire in the lab. It was dowsed with the most quickly available fluid, a barrel of goats blood. Unfortunately, the malignant fumes thus created spread quite far from the building. Those exposed have suffered diverse unnatural effects.

name: Something has gone wrong in the arcane l
description: Something has gone wrong in the arcane laboratory

name: Something has gone horribly wrong in the
description: Something has gone horribly wrong in the arcane laboratory

name: There was an accident in the arcane labo
description: There was an accident in the arcane laboratory.

name: One of your researchers stumbled upon fo
description: One of your researchers stumbled upon forbidden lore.

name: A mage happened to mistake one elixir fo
description: A mage happened to mistake one elixir for the other.

name: Something has gone quite wrong in the ar
description: Something has gone quite wrong in the arcane laboratory. Magical energies were released, shrinking one of your mages!

name: Something has gone quite wrong in the ar
description: Something has gone quite wrong in the arcane laboratory. A rift in the fabric of reality was briefly opened and one of your mages glimpsed the horror beyond!

name: Something has gone horribly wrong in the
description: Something has gone horribly wrong in the arcane laboratory.

name: Something went wrong when one of your ma
description: Something went wrong when one of your mages attempted a ritual spell. A rift in the fabric of reality was created and a malevolent being from beyond slipped through.

name: Something went horribly wrong when one o
description: Something went horribly wrong when one of your mages attempted a newly researched conjuring spell.

name: One of your researchers discovered forbi
description: One of your researchers discovered forbidden knowledge and has attracted unwanted attention.

name: Bad omens.
description: Bad omens.

name: Good omens.
description: Good omens.

name: People are taking some extra time off fr
description: People are taking some extra time off from their chores.

name: People here are realizing they don't lik
description: People here are realizing they don't like to work.

name: This is truly a land of plenty. Since pe
description: This is truly a land of plenty. Since people no longer have to work for food, they are becoming less industrious. Some just hang around, waiting for something to happen.

name: People have not bothered to hoard food f
description: People have not bothered to hoard food for winter. Dire consequences now follow.

name: Fields have not been tended properly.
description: Fields have not been tended properly.

name: Taxes have been lowered in an attempt to
description: Taxes have been lowered in an attempt to appease the unruly commoners.

name: One of your mages have been toiling dili
description: One of your mages have been toiling diligently outside working hours, fashioning a wondrous gift.

name: People are working hard, to the benefit
description: People are working hard, to the benefit of the realm. Taxes have been raised.

name: Taxes have been raised by the righteous
description: Taxes have been raised by the righteous governor of the realm. He wisely aims to improve defenses.

name: The lawgivers of this land are effective
description: The lawgivers of this land are effectively rooting out unlawful elements. A famous criminal leader has recently been tried and hanged.

name: Tax collectors have been threatened and,
description: Tax collectors have been threatened and, in some cases, mysteriously disappeared.

name: Disease is spreading.
description: Disease is spreading.

name: Rivers have swollen, flooding parts of t
description: Rivers have swollen, flooding parts of the land.

description: Famine has struck the land.

description: Severe famine has struck the land.

description: Rivers have swollen, flooding parts of the land.

name: Disease is spreading.
description: Disease is spreading.

name: The sea is being polluted by the crowded
description: The sea is being polluted by the crowded settlements in this province.

name: A new breed of mosquitoes are infesting
description: A new breed of mosquitoes are infesting the swamps, spreading disease in the area.

name: Some of your magic pearls turned out to
description: Some of your magic pearls turned out to be fake!

name: One of your dwarven smiths has been work
description: One of your dwarven smiths has been working diligently to fashion a magic item [Star of Heroes].

name: One of your smiths has been working dili
description: One of your smiths has been working diligently to fashion a magic item [Faithful].

name: An old dwarf in your service has fashion
description: An old dwarf in your service has fashioned a smith's hammer imbued with his power and skill.[Dwarven Hammer]

name: An old dwarf in your service has forged
description: An old dwarf in your service has forged a hammer.[Hammer of the Mountains]

name: The tax collector has been waylaid!
description: The tax collector has been waylaid!

name: Meddling with dark arts, your necromance
description: Meddling with dark arts, your necromancer has attracted unwanted attention. Spirits from the nether realms now haunt this land in search for the mage. They attack indiscriminately.

name: One of your mages has befriended some ma
description: One of your mages has befriended some magic beings.

name: One of your mages has befriended some ma
description: One of your mages has befriended some magic beings.

name: One of your mages is being harassed by a
description: One of your mages is being harassed by a gang of imps. They are annoying but might be put to some use.

name: One of your mages has befriended some ma
description: One of your mages has befriended some magic beings.

name: One of your trolls has fetched his cousi
description: One of your trolls has fetched his cousins.

name: One of your trolls has fetched his cousi
description: One of your trolls has fetched his cousins.

description: Long live the King of Old! A King of the Mound and his host rises to claim what was once their domain.

name: Dabbling in blood magic is fraught with
description: Dabbling in blood magic is fraught with dangers. A horde of vicious imps have managed to escape the summoning circle!

name: A mage in your service has struck a deal
description: A mage in your service has struck a deal with infernal powers.

name: When traveling through the woods, one of
description: When traveling through the woods, one of your mages liberated some faeries held captive by a hideous troll.

name: When investigating the swamp, one of you
description: When investigating the swamp, one of your commanders rescued a traveling adventurer from quicksand.

description: Something went horribly wrong when one of your unfortunate mages attempted a spell gleaned from a forbidden tome.

name: Tired of the strict laws and multitude o
description: Tired of the strict laws and multitude of regulations governing their lives, the people of this province has embraced a foreign faith, hoping for liberty.

name: Sick of harsh laws and repressive taxati
description: Sick of harsh laws and repressive taxation, a large part of of the inhabitants have migrated elsewhere.

name: The over-zealous governor has struck dow
description: The over-zealous governor has struck down hard on unruly elements in the society.

name: Some unnecessary laws have been abolishe
description: Some unnecessary laws have been abolished.

name: The governor of the province has died fr
description: The governor of the province has died from a wasting disease. His incompetent brother-in-law has now taken over the administrative duties.

name: Corruption flourishes, diminishing tax r
description: Corruption flourishes, diminishing tax returns.

name: The effective government of this provinc
description: The effective government of this province is giving increased tax returns.

name: An atheistic movement has gained followe
description: An atheistic movement has gained followers. They claim that the current efficiency of production only enrichens those in power and demands that the produce of society be returned to the people.

name: Foreign priests have infiltrated the loc
description: Foreign priests have infiltrated the local church and corrupted central tenets of faith!

name: A huge copper bull was excavated from an
description: A huge copper bull was excavated from an ancient buried settlement. The proud locals put it in the shrine, somewhat covering your effigy. A visiting leper was cured and now a cult has formed around the foreign idol.

name: A miracle has been performed! Unfortunat
description: A miracle has been performed! Unfortunately the miracle worker adheres to a rival faith.

name: People are being sacrificed in the woods
description: People are being sacrificed in the woods. It may be just a rumor.

name: An enterprising taskmaster has rounded u
description: An enterprising taskmaster has rounded up some renegade slaves and forced them back into service. He was paid handsomely from the treasury.

name: A Marshmaster has tamed some beasts from
description: A Marshmaster has tamed some beasts from the swamp.

name: Some serpents from the swamp have been t
description: Some serpents from the swamp have been tamed.

name: A skillful Marshmaster has managed to ca
description: A skillful Marshmaster has managed to catch and tame a beast from the swamp.

name: An enterprising taskmaster has rounded u
description: An enterprising taskmaster has rounded up some renegade slaves and forced them back into service. He was paid handsomely from the treasury.

description: A Marshmaster has tamed some beast from the swamp.

description: Some serpents from the swamp have been tamed.

name: A Marshmaster has managed to catch and t
description: A Marshmaster has managed to catch and tame a beast from the swamp.

name: Swamp-fever has swept the human populati
description: Swamp-fever has swept the human population.

name: The autumn has been extraordinarily wet,
description: The autumn has been extraordinarily wet, expanding the marshlands. Toads proliferate and a vicious breed has been attacking travelers.

name: A swamp drake has been ravaging the bord
description: A swamp drake has been ravaging the borders of the marshland. Gnawed remains of unfortunate travelers have been found.

name: An animist and his followers are trying
description: An animist and his followers are trying to reclaim their land.

name: People have been found drowned in the sw
description: People have been found drowned in the swamp. Some say they are the victims of human sacrifice performed to appease spirits of the wetlands.

name: A ragged traveler appeared on the border
description: A ragged traveler appeared on the borders of the waste. He claimed to have found the ruins of the fabled city of K'leng. Before he was driven back into the waste by villagers offended by his preposterous statement, he offered as proof an item he supposedly found on the gilded altar of a temple in the ruined city.

name: Your servant dabbles in arts both dark a
description: Your servant dabbles in arts both dark and dangerous. The vengeful dead have been stirred!
effects: incscale2 Death|stealthcom Shade|addequip 3|8d6units Shadow Soldier|8d6units Shade

name: A hunter stumbled upon some strange crea
description: A hunter stumbled upon some strange creatures feasting in a sunlit glen in the woods. When he approached, they vanished in the blink of an eye. Left on the ground were some unnaturally large acorns. [Handful of Acorns]

name: Strange creatures have been seen in the
description: Strange creatures have been seen in the borderlands. Some say they must have come by magical means from other worlds. [Gateway]

name: The Monolith has attracted a group of wo
description: The Monolith has attracted a group of worshipers. [Monolith]
effects: nation -2|4d6units Atlantian Light Infantry|1com Deep Seer

name: A mage has come to study the magics of t
description: A mage has come to study the magics of the Mirror Palace. [Mirror Palace]

name: A creature has emerged from the Tar Pits
description: A creature has emerged from the Tar Pits to wreak havoc. [Tar Pits]

name: The Gold Apple Tree has borne fruit this
description: The Gold Apple Tree has borne fruit this autumn! [Gold Apple Tree]

name: A farmer has found a golden apple. [Gold
description: A farmer has found a golden apple. [Gold Apple Tree]

name: The power of the earth is strong in this
description: The power of the earth is strong in this land. The Gold Apple Tree is bearing ample fruit! [Gold Apple Tree]

name: Hot winds are sweeping from the Plain of
description: Hot winds are sweeping from the Plain of Perpetual Drought. [Plain of Perpetual Drought]

name: There has been an explosion at the Alche
description: There has been an explosion at the Alchemists Guild! Repairs have been costly and one of the researchers was injured. [Alchemists Guild]

description: There has been an explosion at the Alchemists Guild! Repairs have been costly. [Alchemists Guild]

description: There has been an explosion at the Alchemists Guild! Interestingly, an unpredicted reaction produced a huge amount of magical gems. [Alchemists Guild]

description: Some alchemists have gathered to trade secrets and find ingredients for their research. One of them has been recruited into service. [Alchemists Guild]

name: Strange lights have been seen in the bog
description: Strange lights have been seen in the boglands. [Bog of Strange Lights]

name: A sage has been studying the flowers of
description: A sage has been studying the flowers of the wetlands. He claims to have attracted the attention of some strange beings that now follow him around. [Bog of Strange Lights]
effects: nation -2|1com Sage|3d6units Will o' the Wisp

description: There has been a volcanic eruption! [Volcano]

name: The volcano has stirred. Creatures of fi
description: The volcano has stirred. Creatures of fire and molten stone are laying waste to the surrounding land! [Volcano]

name: An adept of Pyriphlegeton has arrived to
description: An adept of Pyriphlegeton has arrived to study the volcanic activity in the area. He was persuaded to swear allegiance after having examined the volcano. [Volcano]

name: There is an old legend in this land: Onc
description: There is an old legend in this land: Once upon a time a mighty wizard built his abode upon the highest peak. From there he worked his magic, trying to control the winds and the clouds and the beasts that fly. Angered by the wizards hubris, the Lord of Thunder struck him with such force that the mountain was cloven in half. The legend tells that some of the magic of that place remains and that whoever finds the wizards skull will command all winged beings on earth. [The Cloven Mountain]
