description: People flock to your glorious new temple! The natives have come into the fold and sing hymns at the feet of your image. Rich offerings have been given at the altar.

name: The unruly elements have been forcefully
description: The unruly elements have been forcefully dealt with. You rule is now unopposed.

name: The emerging rebellion has not been deal
description: The emerging rebellion has not been dealt with in time. A leader has emerged among the natives. He or she is hiding among the people, organizing resistance against your rule.

name: The local rebellion has reached its clim
description: The local rebellion has reached its climax. Riots are erupting everywhere! The few loyal men in the defence have been slaughtered by angry kinsmen and an all-out attack has been coordinated by the leaders of the resistance!

name: The tax collector has been waylaid! Some
description: The tax collector has been waylaid! Some say the rebellious locals are behind this.

name: Your forces are trying to control the re
description: Your forces are trying to control the rebellious province, but they cannot fight what they cannot find. More men will not help, but perhaps a prolonged search.

name: Some of your settlers have been killed i
description: Some of your settlers have been killed in quarrels with the natives.

name: Your agents have gained information on t
description: Your agents have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. A thorough search by armed men may finally bring these criminals to justice.

name: More men are needed to control the rebel
description: More men are needed to control the rebellious natives!

name: Men have defected from the local defence
description: Men have defected from the local defence. They are more loyal to their kinsmen. Some have even joined the growing resistance movement!

name: Opposition against your rule is increasi
description: Opposition against your rule is increasing!

name: A native warrior has challenged one of y
description: A native warrior has challenged one of your commanders to a duel.

name: There has been an attempt to murder one
description: There has been an attempt to murder one of your officials.

name: Your men found the hideout of the resist
description: Your men found the hideout of the resistance leaders, and a battle ensued!
effects: 1com Barbarian Lord|3com Barbarian Chief|6d6units Barbarian|3d6units Barbarian|code 0

name: The natives have reclaimed their land!
description: The natives have reclaimed their land!

name: Your men have gained information on the
description: Your men have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. They will soon be brought to justice!

name: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not
description: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not left this land. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: Traces of the Old Magic has emerged in a
description: Traces of the Old Magic has emerged in a remote village. A young girl has the Witches Mark upon her! Perhaps it would be wise to send a Magister of Theology, lest her power grows, or perhaps one of the Arcane to find out more.

name: The Magister has found the Marked girl i
description: The Magister has found the Marked girl infested with the Old Magics. Regrettably, the poor soul had to be cleansed by fire. Under her bed was found a Mistletoe Garland. [Mistletoe Garland]
requirements: monster Magister of Theology|nomonster Magister Arcane|code 21

name: The Magister Arcane has investigated the
description: The Magister Arcane has investigated the poor girl and indeed found her Marked as of old, when some children were chosen at birth by the Old Magics. There also seems to be more strange things afoot in the area. A huntsman claims he once heard voices in the woods at nightfall. If given time and some guards while exploring the forest, the Magister may find out more.

name: While exploring the forest, your servant
description: While exploring the forest, your servant was attacked by a large wolf!

name: While exploring the forest, your servant
description: While exploring the forest, your servant was attacked by a strange being made of roots and twigs!

name: While exploring the forest, your Magiste
description: While exploring the forest, your Magister found an enchanted glen! [Glen of Verdant Greenery]

name: One of the villagers approached the Magi
description: One of the villagers approached the Magister with some acorns. They turned out to be infused with the Old Magics. [Handful of Acorns]

name: The Magister has stumbled upon a circle
description: The Magister has stumbled upon a circle of oaks in the woods. The place seemed of ancient origin but recently used. Utilizing a hex of concealment he observed the place during the night of the new moon and witnessed a ritual performed by the villagers. At the finale the young witch cried out in the forgotten tongue and proved herself a child of the Old Ways! She has been accepted into your service, but the Magister fears her power may have sinister consequences.
effects: code 23|decscale2 Drain|decscale2 Death|nation -2|1com Daughter of Avalon

name: The Old Ways have been practiced in the
description: The Old Ways have been practiced in the land. Farmers look forward to rich harvests and children are born healthy. But as the power of the witches stir, so does the Curse... [Cursed Land]

name: The magic of the witch has released The
description: The magic of the witch has released The Curse upon this land! [Cursed Land]

name: The Old Ways have been practiced in the
description: The Old Ways have been practiced in the land. Farmers look forward to rich harvests and children are born healthy. But as the power of the witches stir, so does the Curse...

name: The magic of the land has cursed some of
description: The magic of the land has cursed some of your men.

name: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not
description: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not left this land. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The Curse is spreading! [Cursed Land]
description: The Curse is spreading! [Cursed Land]

name: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A cleve
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into fire gems.

name: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A cleve
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into a wealth of fire gems.

name: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A cleve
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into fire gems.

name: Local forest spirits have gathered stren
description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

name: Local forest spirits have gathered stren
description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

name: The forest fights back against the burni
description: The forest fights back against the burning god!
effects: 1com Ivy King|addequip 1|6d6units Hama Dryad|4d6units Vine Ogre

name: The forest fights back against the burni
description: The forest fights back against the burning god!
effects: 1com Ivy King|addequip 1|6d6units Hama Dryad|4d6units Vine Ogre

name: The forest fights back against the burni
description: The forest fights back against the burning god!
effects: 1com Ivy King|addequip 1|6d6units Hama Dryad|4d6units Vine Ogre

name: The forest fights back against your aura
description: The forest fights back against your aura of decay!
effects: 1com Ivy King|addequip 1|6d6units Vine Man|decscale2 Death|4d6units Vine Ogre

name: The Silver Sarcophagus has opened. Terro
description: The Silver Sarcophagus has opened. Terror rises from within! [Silver Sarcophagus]

name: The Silver Sarcophagus has been found an
description: The Silver Sarcophagus has been found and opened! From its maw unwholesome energies have emanated, affecting all with death and decay.

name: A temple of the ancestors has been found
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: A temple of the ancestors has been found
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: A temple of the ancestors has been found
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: In the absence of a taskmaster, one of t
description: In the absence of a taskmaster, one of the carnivores has run amok. It was killed, but not before causing some mayhem.

name: The ruins of an ancient temple has been
description: The ruins of an ancient temple has been found. Its crypt is sealed with magic. The mages of the Old Empire probably have knowledge of such things. [Ancient Temple]

name: The Spectator has investigated the runes
description: The Spectator has investigated the runes inscribed on the gate to the temples crypt. A strong and ancient ward seals something within. Given time he may be able to unravel the bindings, but perhaps it would be safer to send one of the Elders.

name: Your Arch Bishop has consecrated the alt
description: Your Arch Bishop has consecrated the altar of the Ancient Temple. The dead and the not yet dead whisper your praise! [Ancient Temple]

name: The Spectator recognizes some of the mar
description: The Spectator recognizes some of the markings in the crypt -signs of warning and runes of containment. He has managed to unravel some of them.

name: At last! The ancient magic of the temple
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! From the darkness within comes a being of terror and power to serve the God of Death. Woe to the living!

name: During his attempt to break the wards of
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: During his attempt to break the wards of
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: Studying the ancient magic that seals th
description: Studying the ancient magic that seals the temple crypt, your servant has gained insights in the workings of the arts!

name: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient ru
description: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient runes sealing the temple crypt. Some are easily broken, but others need time and the process is dangerous.

name: During his attempt to break the wards of
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: Studying the ancient magic that seals th
description: Studying the ancient magic that seals the temple crypt, your servant has gained deeper knowledge of the arts!

name: At last! The ancient magic of the temple
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! From the darkness within comes a being of terror and power to serve the God of Death. Woe to the living!

name: At last! The ancient magic of the temple
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! Within its vault the dried husk of a mage-priest of old was found. [Skull Mentor]

name: At last! The ancient magic of the temple
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! Within its vault an item of power was found. [Skull Staff]

name: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient ru
description: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient runes sealing the temple crypt. Some are easily broken, but others need time and the process is dangerous.

name: Having prevented a village of fishermen
description: Having prevented a village of fishermen from eating an exceptionally large and tasty fish the Bodhisattva released it into the ocean. The fish then transformed back into its true dragon shape and returned to his father, the Dragon King. The grateful father sent as a gift of thanks his most precious possession, the pearl of light. The gift was accepted only on the condition that the messenger, who was also the Dragon King's grand daughter, would take the pearl. The dragon girl accepted, and the two has been inseparable ever since. Longnu still carries her grand fathers pearl of light.

name: Raiders from sea are harrying coastal se
description: Raiders from sea are harrying coastal settlements. The governor of the province asks for gold to strengthen defenses.

name: Raiders from the sea have been repelled!
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled! Seeing that the Good Lord provides safety, people are now more eager to pay their taxes.

name: Some of the gold for the defenses seem t
description: Some of the gold for the defenses seem to have gone into the pockets of the local governor.

name: Raiders from the sea have been repelled,
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled, but not before they slaughtered the men, women, children and cattle of some coastal villages. People are upset. The local governor again asks for gold to strengthen defenses!

name: Raiders from the sea are continuing to h
description: Raiders from the sea are continuing to harry the coastal settlements.

name: Your temple has been burnt by raiders fr
description: Your temple has been burnt by raiders from the sea!

name: Lord save us from the wrath of the North
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the poorly defended land.
effects: code 0|1com Human Huskarl|12d6units Human Huskarl|8d6units Human Huskarl|2com Human Huskarl

name: Lord save us from the wrath of the North
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of the raide
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the raiders! Your people cry your name in anguish while pirates from the sea bear down upon the poorly defended land.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of the raide
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the raiders! Your people cry your name in anguish while pirates from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: Raiders from the sea have been repelled!
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled! Seeing that the Good Lord provides safety, people are now more eager to pay their taxes.

name: Chaotic energies leak from the demon gat
description: Chaotic energies leak from the demon gate. A very powerful blood-mage may be able to control them. [The Demon Gate]

name: Someone has been meddling with the Demon
description: Someone has been meddling with the Demon Gate! Its chaotic energies have suffused the aether of this world, spreading chaos and corruption. [The Demon Gate]

name: The master of Blood Magic has studied th
description: The master of Blood Magic has studied the magic of the Demon Gate. Soon, it will be under your control.

name: The master of Blood Magic has been able
description: The master of Blood Magic has been able to control the energies of the Demon Gate. Powerful Devils have been summoned and bound into service!

name: The Blood Mage has lost control of the c
description: The Blood Mage has lost control of the chaotic energies of The Demon Gate! A multitude of Devils have emerged to wreak havoc.

name: A benevolent star rises. During its reig
description: A benevolent star rises. During its reign the wounded and diseased will find succor.

name: The sun grows dim! A solar eclipse of my
description: The sun grows dim! A solar eclipse of mystical origin has shrouded the world in darkness.

name: The Sign of Nodens has been found. Wound
description: The Sign of Nodens has been found. Wounds have miraculously healed all over the world. [Sign of Nodens]

name: The Vale of Infinite Horror has been fou
description: The Vale of Infinite Horror has been found! Many have been marked... [The Vale of Infinite Horror]

name: Mages of The Ebony Circle have attempted
description: Mages of The Ebony Circle have attempted a ritual of great power. The malignant energies released have spread across the world. [The Ebony Circle]

name: Mabakiel The Bringer of Misery has been
description: Mabakiel The Bringer of Misery has been summoned into the world! In his wake, disease is spreading.

name: The Eater of Dreams has emerged, lurking
description: The Eater of Dreams has emerged, lurking behind the veil of sleep. People all across the world suffer from nightmares, marking their spirits as food for the Eater.

name: An abomination rises from the sea!
description: An abomination rises from the sea!

name: The Goat Sun has been summoned into the
description: The Goat Sun has been summoned into the world!

name: Disabled ----- The Throne of Gaia brings
description: Disabled ----- The Throne of Gaia brings growth and health to the world. [The Throne of Gaia]

name: The Throne of Life brings youth to all l
description: The Throne of Life brings youth to all living. [The Throne of Life]

name: The Throne of Death has awoken! Life sud
description: The Throne of Death has awoken! Life suddenly seems shorter. [The Throne of Death]

name: The power of The Throne of Fortune is sp
description: The power of The Throne of Fortune is spreading. [The Throne of Fortune]

name: The power of The Throne of Misfortune is
description: The power of The Throne of Misfortune is spreading. [The Throne of Misfortune]

name: The Throne of Pestilence spreads its dis
description: The Throne of Pestilence spreads its disease throughout the world. [The Throne of Pestilence]

name: An extra trone of pestilence reset. Ther
description: An extra trone of pestilence reset. There are other resetting events also.HIDDEN.

name: The Throne of Summer is spreading warmth
description: The Throne of Summer is spreading warmth across the world. [The Throne of Summer]

name: The Throne of Winter is spreading cold a
description: The Throne of Winter is spreading cold across the world. [The Throne of Winter]

name: Wolves have come to serve the Lord of Th
description: Wolves have come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]
effects: nation -2|4d6units Wolf|2d6units Dire Wolf|1com Dire Wolf

name: An Ice Druid has come to serve the Lord
description: An Ice Druid has come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The Ice Druid has utilized the power of
description: The Ice Druid has utilized the power of The Winter Throne to summon some magical beings. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The lands around the Throne of Winter ar
description: The lands around the Throne of Winter are growing increasingly cold. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The land has been trapped in perpetual w
description: The land has been trapped in perpetual winter. [Frozen Lands]

name: A tribe of Yetis has come to serve the L
description: A tribe of Yetis has come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]

name: If given time, an astral mage may be abl
description: If given time, an astral mage may be able to find interesting things at the Eye Pebble Plain. [Eye Pebble Plain]

name: Your mage has found a curious item among
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eye of the Void]

name: Your mage has found a curious item among
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eye of Aiming]

name: Your mage has found a curious item among
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eyecatcher]

name: Your mage has found a curious item among
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. There seems to be no more of interest here. [Eye of Innocence]

name: Your mage has found some magical pearls
description: Your mage has found some magical pearls among the pebbles of the beach.

name: The Enchanted Current has produced some
description: The Enchanted Current has produced some extra magical pearls this month! [Enchanted Current]

name: Bernlad and his steed have found The Val
description: Bernlad and his steed have found The Vale of Unicorns! [The Vale of Unicorns]

name: Bernlad has bested a fellow Knight. When
description: Bernlad has bested a fellow Knight. When yielding, the man swore to serve your cause.

name: Preparations for the celebration of the
description: Preparations for the celebration of the yearly ritual of the sacred marriage are underway. Come spring the Entu and his Ensi are supposed to be joined in the sacred marriage that will provide fertility for the coming year.

name: The Entu and Ensi have consummated the S
description: The Entu and Ensi have consummated the Sacred Marriage in the yearly ritual of fertility. There was much rejoicing.

name: The Entu is missing from the capital and
description: The Entu is missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Ensi is missing from the capital and
description: The Ensi is missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Entu and Ensi are missing from the c
description: The Entu and Ensi are missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Sacred Marriage has borne fruit! The
description: The Sacred Marriage has borne fruit! The fields and orchards of Ur provide the first plentiful harvest of the year!

name: The fecund power of The Sacred Marriage
description: The fecund power of The Sacred Marriage prevails! The fields and orchards of Ur provide a second plentiful harvest of the year!

name: The fields and orchards of Ur are barren
description: The fields and orchards of Ur are barren this year. Famine threatens the people.

name: In the wake of famine comes plague!
description: In the wake of famine comes plague!

name: The lamentations of the Galas has drawn
description: The lamentations of the Galas has drawn the attention of spirits from the underworld.

name: Your Sal-Me has blessed the land with fe
description: Your Sal-Me has blessed the land with fertility! [The First City]

name: A tribe of rural Enkidu has come to atte
description: A tribe of rural Enkidu has come to attend the upcoming festival. Some have been recruited as warriors of the realm.
effects: nation -2|3d6units Enkidu|2d6units Enkidu Archer|2d6units Enkidu Warrior|1com Enkidu Chief

name: People have come bearing gifts for the u
description: People have come bearing gifts for the upcoming festival of fertility.

name: Enkidu slaves have rebelled!
description: Enkidu slaves have rebelled!

name: A runaway slave from the land of the avv
description: A runaway slave from the land of the avvites has appeared. He brings to your altar an item taken from the body of his former master. [Ring of the Warrior]

name: One of your Hunter Chiefs has ventured i
description: One of your Hunter Chiefs has ventured into the swamp. There he single-handedly fought and bested a giant crocodile. Thus tamed it has now been put to use in war.

name: One of the Elders has stepped forth to q
description: One of the Elders has stepped forth to quell the growing unrest in the capital.

name: The innermost crypt in The Tomb of the A
description: The innermost crypt in The Tomb of the Ancients is sealed. A master of death magic may be able to open it. [Tomb of the Ancients]

name: Someone has meddled with the sealed door
description: Someone has meddled with the sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients. A curse has taken effect.

name: The necromantic master has found a way t
description: The necromantic master has found a way to open The Tomb of the Ancients. The wards are ancient, dangerous and powerful, but given time they may be broken.

name: A horror has been attracted by the meddl
description: A horror has been attracted by the meddling with the doors in The Tomb of the Ancients.

name: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Anci
description: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients have been opened! The malevolent force slumbering inside has been released!

name: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Anci
description: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients have been opened! The malevolent force slumbering inside has woken to serve your will.

name: A horror has been attracted by the meddl
description: A horror has been attracted by the meddling in The Tomb of the Ancients.

name: Ever since The Crown of Darkness was fou
description: Ever since The Crown of Darkness was found, a lingering shadow has been growing in the sky above its location. It has now spread to blot out the sun! [Crown of Darkness]

name: Dark tendrils of pure shadow slowly seep
description: Dark tendrils of pure shadow slowly seeps from The Crown of Darkness into the sky. [Crown of Darkness]

name: The power of The Throne of Night has bee
description: The power of The Throne of Night has been invoked! Ever since, the day has grown dimmer. Now Night has overtaken Day and all is darkness!

name: The power of The Throne of Night has bee
description: The power of The Throne of Night has been invoked! The days will grow dimmer until, in eight months time, the night overtakes the day! [The Throne of Night]

name: A local gravedigger has heard scratching
description: A local gravedigger has heard scratching and howling from beneath the stone slab covering an old grave. He refuses to open it unless a Black Priest is present. [Black Forest]

name: The grave has been opened under the supe
description: The grave has been opened under the supervision of a Black Priest. Underneath the heavy stone slab a vampire was trapped! It has now joined your cause.

name: A gang of ghouls have been rounded up an
description: A gang of ghouls have been rounded up and forced into service. [Cave of Ghouls]

name: Lord save us from the wrath of the North
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.
effects: 1com Human Huskarl|10d6units Human Huskarl|6d6units Human Huskarl|2com Human Huskarl

name: The visiting friar has preached to the l
description: The visiting friar has preached to the lost souls in this province and turned their hearts to the true faith!

name: The visiting friar has held a sermon. Hi
description: The visiting friar has held a sermon. His words inspired such passion that the faithful of the land gathered to raise a temple to your glory!

name: The visiting friar has performed a mirac
description: The visiting friar has performed a miracle! A lame boy was healed and his wealthy mother has donated all her riches to the church.

name: The visiting friar has held a sermon. Hi
description: The visiting friar has held a sermon. His words inspired such passion that some of the faithful has taken to arms to fight for the righteous God!

name: An old scroll was found in the temple ru
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Marshmaster has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: An old scroll was found in the temple ru
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Grand Thaumaturg has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: An old scroll was found in the temple ru
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Arch Theurg has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: An old scroll was found in the temple ru
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Grand Master has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: Something stirs in the land of the dead!
description: Something stirs in the land of the dead! A weary traveler crosses the once verdant lands. He seeks the fabled Ruins of the Old Empire. [Ruins of the Old Empire]

name: In one of the desolated villages, a buri
description: In one of the desolated villages, a buried treasure has been found!

name: In an abandoned tower, some magical gems
description: In an abandoned tower, some magical gems have been found.

name: The dead workers of the mine has been re
description: The dead workers of the mine has been reanimated. They now toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of gold. [Gold Mine]

name: Your undead servants have been put to wo
description: Your undead servants have been put to work in the mine. They toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of silver. [Silver Mine]

name: Your undead servants have been put to wo
description: Your undead servants have been put to work in the mine. They toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of gold. [Hidden Gold Mine]

name: A plague has eradicated the remaining po
description: A plague has eradicated the remaining population!

name: Faced with the inevitable, some of the l
description: Faced with the inevitable, some of the living have turned to the necromantic arts for protection. They are now trying to take control of the province!

name: Your Dusk Elder has found the lab of a f
description: Your Dusk Elder has found the lab of a famous wizard who died a some time ago. The man has now been conjured as a spectre, to serve once more.

name: Food has long been scarce. The last harv
description: Food has long been scarce. The last harvest yielded next to nothing. People are dying by the score.

name: The forest is dying. Some last power of
description: The forest is dying. Some last power of life has awoken, trying to fight the impeding doom.

description: Food has long been scarce. The last harvest yielded next to nothing. People are emigrating in hope of finding arable land.

name: A few of the natives have managed to sur

name: A heretical movement seems to have taken
description: A heretical movement seems to have taken root in the province! Among other things, they abstain from animal food and disregard the clergy! Perhaps someone from the House of Fiery Justice should be sent. Or if a more subtle approach is suitable mayhap one of the friars or inquisitors can put things to rest.

name: The heretics are strengthening their inf
description: The heretics are strengthening their influence! Something must be done.

name: The heretics are strengthening their inf
description: The heretics are strengthening their influence! Tension are rising. There have been some attacks on the heretics by faithful commoners.

name: Your friar has held a sermon expanding u
description: Your friar has held a sermon expanding upon the sacrament of the priesthood. He seems to have had some success in swaying the general populace from the heresies.
requirements: monster Friar|nomonster Inquisitor|nomonster High Inquisitor|nomonster Grand Master|code 67

name: Heretical teachings have once again surf
description: Heretical teachings have once again surfaced in the area. Perhaps someone from the House of Just Fires should be sent. Or if a more subtle approach is suitable mayhap one of the friars can put things to rest.

name: Your Inquisitor has interrogated a few o
description: Your Inquisitor has interrogated a few of the heretics and found them lacking in purity of faith. If given twenty men he will arrest the most prominent leaders and put an end to their false preachings!

name: Leaders of the heretical movement and th
description: Leaders of the heretical movement and their families have been arrested, incarcerated and forced to confess. Many have been put on the pyre. Purity of faith is now ensured! Also, some of their belongings have been confiscated.

name: During the arrest of the leaders of the
description: During the arrest of the leaders of the heretical movement, some supposedly innocent bystanders were killed. This incited the mob and now there is a full-blown riot going on!

name: Your High Inquisitor has interrogated a
description: Your High Inquisitor has interrogated a few of the heretics and found them lacking in purity of faith. If given twenty men he will arrest the most prominent leaders and put an end to their false preachings!

name: During the arrest of the leaders of the

name: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leade
description: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. They have been interrogated thoroughly and revealed much. It seems they have made pacts with devils to snare the hearts of the innocent commoners! The most prominent warlocks have been put to the pyre and all is now well. In their abode some items of power were found. [Imp Familiar]
requirements: monster Witch Hunter|nomonster High Inquisitor|rare 50|nomonster Inquisitor|code 67

name: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leade
description: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. During their interrogation, things got out of hand and one or two of them did not survive the rigors. Unfortunately they seem to have been loved by the commoners and a riot has broken out!
requirements: monster Witch Hunter|nomonster High Inquisitor|rare 50|nomonster Inquisitor|code 67

name: There have been rumors of witchcraft! So
description: There have been rumors of witchcraft! Someone from The House of Just Fires should be sent to root it out!

name: The abode of a witch has been found. The
description: The abode of a witch has been found. The crone herself must have turned into a crow and escaped, but some of her belongings have been confiscated and transported to the lab.

name: A full coven seems to be at work! Your W
description: A full coven seems to be at work! Your Witch Hunter urges that at least twenty armed men are sent to help hunt them down.

name: A witch has attacked your servant!
description: A witch has attacked your servant!

name: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial B
description: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial By Water. Unfortunately the poor girl did not float. Her sacrifice was not in vain, as the hunt continues. God bless her soul!

name: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial B
description: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial By Water. The girl floated as a fat goose on the water and was promptly lapidated until she sank.

name: People are getting increasingly aware of
description: People are getting increasingly aware of the presence witches in their midst. Several have been revealed by good and pious neighbors bearing witness of their evil magic.

name: When put to the pyre, one of the witches
description: When put to the pyre, one of the witches uttered a dark curse over the realm!

name: The coven has been found! Your men are f
description: The coven has been found! Your men are fighting them with magic and steel.

name: A Witch Hunter should lead the men if th
description: A Witch Hunter should lead the men if the coven is to be found.

name: For the time being, there seems to be no
description: For the time being, there seems to be no traces of witchery left in the area.

name: It has been revealed that one of the nob
description: It has been revealed that one of the noble women of the land has been practicing witchcraft! She has been muted and put in the dungeon. Her sorcerous tools were confiscated and her family willingly paid a handsome fine.

name: Witchery! Your servant has been attacked
description: Witchery! Your servant has been attacked by a poisonous spider!

name: Witchery! Milk has turned sour in the ud
description: Witchery! Milk has turned sour in the udder! A crow was seen molesting an eagle! Surely this is proof of Dark Arts afoot in the realm!

description: Your Initiate has been befuddled by the craft of the witches. He claims the rumors are false and the accused women innocent! Someone more experienced should be sent.

description: Your Hydra Tamer has caught some Hatchlings.

description: Your Hydra Tamer has stirred an aggressive Hatchling!

description: Your Hydra Tamer has located the nesting place of a full-grown specimen. A handful of men are needed to aid him in the hunt if the Hydra is to be caught.

description: The Hydra was found but could not be controlled! Angered by attempts to catch it, the beast now runs amok!

description: The Hydra has been caught and tamed!

description: Your Hydra tamer has encountered a strange tribe in the swamp. They seem gullible and can probably be bought with wine, trinkets and pearls of glass. [Toad Tribe Settlement]

description: Your commander has encountered a strange tribe in the swamp. They seem gullible and can probably be bought with wine, trinkets and pearls of glass. [Toad Tribe Settlement]

name: A huntsman has found fresh tracks at the
description: A huntsman has found fresh tracks at the old C'tissian ruins. Some kind of sign was drawn in brownish red on a stone slab in the center of the ruins. One of the theurgs might be able to interpret it. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: The Theurg has investigated the old ruin
description: The Theurg has investigated the old ruins. The sign scribbled in goat blood is of necromantic origin. If given some time, he should be able to find out more.

name: Your Theurg has encountered a Necromance
description: Your Theurg has encountered a Necromancer in the ruins! A battle ensued.

name: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer i
description: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer in the ruins! Having had premonitions of this encounter, your servant was accompanied by some men from the local garrison.

name: After the battle, some items were found
description: After the battle, some items were found in the Necromancers camp. They seem to originate from the old ruins. One of the old scrolls contained mystical wisdom in hieroglyphic script, concerning the ancient necromantic arts. [Doom Glaive]

name: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer i
description: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer in the ruins! After a brief struggle, the man gave up and has now been persuaded to work for the Pythian administration.

name: A young farmer has returned from an unex
description: A young farmer has returned from an unexpected adventure. Venturing into the mountains in search of his lost sheep, he stumbled upon a cave. When a dragon appeared from its maw the young man said his final prayers. Strangely, the beast halted in its steps. More drakes appeared and now follow the farmer as sheep would follow a shepherd.

description: The temple foundation was sloppily built, leading to faults in the construction. Pillars and walls have collapsed. Repairs were costly and some followers have not bothered to attend mass lately.

description: The extensive bureaucracy of the local government is costly, decreasing tax gains to the treasury.

description: People have tired of your oppressive rule!

name: Some of the militia employed in defenses
description: Some of the militia employed in defenses have been poorly trained. Many never show up for exercises.

description: A group of freethinkers has been banned. They and their kin has left the land in search of a more pluralistic government.

description: A troubadour has come to your court with his dancing bear, bringing much merriment.

name: An unnatural plague has swept the provin
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since. [Crown of Darkness]

name: Local legends speak of a great Mage King
description: Local legends speak of a great Mage King that once ruled these lands. There came a time of decline, when magic and wonder drained from the realm. The wise King used his craft to preserve his citadel and his magical servants from harm, sealing it in the hidden realm with strong spells. Mayhap one greatly skilled in Astral Magic could find out more. [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet
description: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet powerful enchantments in some old ruins far from civilization. Given time, they can probably be unravelled. [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: The old spells have been broken! Suddenl
description: The old spells have been broken! Suddenly the ruined citadel has come to life once more! Its walls have risen, banners fly from the parapets and the courtyard bustles with activity. Within the Great Hall the Mage King once more holds court! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Your mage has dabbled in arts he does no
description: Your mage has dabbled in arts he does not fully master. During attempts to unravel the enchantments resting in this place, a magical flux has conjured beings of pure magic to attack the province! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: The old spells have been broken! Suddenl
description: The old spells have been broken! Suddenly the ruined citadel has come to life once more! Its walls have risen, banners fly from the parapets and the courtyard bustles with activity. Within the Great Hall the Mage King once more holds court! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Local legends speak of a time long ago w
description: Local legends speak of a time long ago when a powerful Necromancer held the land in terror with his undead servants. They say he found the secret of immortality. A hundred years passed before a group of heroes brought down his evil rule. The Necromancer could not be killed however, so supposedly he still hides in his secret lair, waiting for a chance to once more rise to power. Perhaps one greatly skilled in the Dark Arts could find his abode. [Necromancer's Lair]

name: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet
description: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet powerful magic in some old ruins far from civilization. Given time, it can probably be unravelled. [Necromancer's Lair]

name: The old spells have been broken and the
description: The old spells have been broken and the abode of The Necromancer revealed! Seeing the opportunities given in your service, he has agreed to follow your command. At least for now... [Necromancer's Lair]

name: Your mage has dabbled in arts he does no
description: Your mage has dabbled in arts he does not fully master. The undead servants of The Necromancer has been released upon the province![Necromancer's Lair]

description: The old spells have been broken and the abode of The Necromancer revealed! Seeing the opportunities given in your service, he has agreed to follow your command. At least for now... [Necromancer's Lair]

description: The Necromancer has increased his power! [Necromancer's Lair]

name: Cattle have disappeared. A farmer found
description: Cattle have disappeared. A farmer found their bones on a scorched patch of earth.[Dragon Lair]

name: A Red Dragon has been sighted! Its lair
description: A Red Dragon has been sighted! Its lair must be nearby, probably full of treasures! A mage highly skilled in fire magic should be able to locate it.[Dragon Lair]

name: The Dragons Lair has been found unguar
description: The Dragons Lair has been found unguarded! Heaps of gold, gems and magic items have been plundered from its hoard. [Dragon Lair]

name: The Dragon is devastating the province,
description: The Dragon is devastating the province, enraged by the theft of its gold![Dragon Lair]

name: The Dragon has been slain! Its scales ha
description: The Dragon has been slain! Its scales have been fashioned into suits of magical armor, its gem-studded belly plundered. The world is poorer without such a fabulous creature. [Red Dragon Scale Mail]

name: One of the goats has mysteriously disapp
description: One of the goats has mysteriously disappeared. Its carcass was later found on a spot of scorched ground.

name: One of the goats has mysteriously disapp

name: A Dragon has been attracted by the goats
description: A Dragon has been attracted by the goats, and now roams the province for prey!

name: Some magical gems have been found near t
description: Some magical gems have been found near the spot of scorched earth where the goat was recently slain.

name: Hunters report strange sightings from th
description: Hunters report strange sightings from the forest. An area deep in the woods has become impassable from a sudden eruption of thorn and bramble that seem to move slowly, almost as if directed by an unknown force of will. Someone greatly skilled in nature magic may be able to pass the barrier. A less subtle option could be to burn a passage. [Tower of Thorns]

name: A nature mage has used the craft to make
description: A nature mage has used the craft to make passage through the bramble. In the heart of the forest, a tower of thorn rises! The hedge surrounding it resists attempts to pass, but may yield in time.[Tower of Thorns]

name: The corpse of an unfortunate adventurer
description: The corpse of an unfortunate adventurer has been found in the thorn, with some items of value. The magic protecting this place is strong. More time is needed to clear the way.[Tower of Thorns]

name: The Tower of Thorns have been reached! W
description: The Tower of Thorns have been reached! Within resides a powerful mage. He has grudgingly accepted to yield to your power and wisdom. [Tower of Thorns]

name: With magical fire some of the thorn has
description: With magical fire some of the thorn has been cleared. It grows back quickly however, so more time is needed. In the ashes some magical gems were found.[Tower of Thorns]

name: The thorn withers and burns under the sc
description: The thorn withers and burns under the scorching magical flame! Part of the forest has been set on fire. From the center of the twisting growth a Mage emerges with his servants to defend his abode![Tower of Thorns]

description: The wild beasts have grown in number lately, coming near settlements and harassing travelers. Now a pack of wolves have attacked one of the villages, forcing the local defence to intervene. Some peasants have joined the soldiers.

name: An evil necromancer is trying to drive h

name: A fertility festival was held in the pro

description: The grave has been opened under the supervision of a Black Priest. Underneath the heavy stone slab a vampire was trapped! It has now joined your cause.

name: The Time of the Northmen is at hand! The
description: The Time of the Northmen is at hand! They worship a heathen Idol, paying him tribute in blood and plunder! If it is destroyed, their resolve may weaken.

description: A leader of the Horror Cult is spreading his blasphemies in secret! Unless found and dealt with, the Cult will grow in power and influence!

name: Villagers claim their infant children ha
description: Villagers claim their infant children have grown unnaturally ugly. Some have scorned their mothers' breasts and have strange cravings. This is mostly rejected as nonsense by wiser folks.

name: One of your commanders has been waylaid
description: One of your commanders has been waylaid and attacked!

name: The son of a noble has been set upon by
description: The son of a noble has been set upon by trolls while hunting in the foothills! The local garrison came to aid when hearing the sound of his horn. If he survives, the young man will probably join your cause.
effects: 1com War Troll|2d6units Troll|nation -2|1com Knight Commander|2d6units Heavy Cavalry

name: Trolls have attacked! They are uncharact
description: Trolls have attacked! They are uncharacteristically well equipped and seem to fight with purpose.

name: A goatherd claims to have seen a gilded
description: A goatherd claims to have seen a gilded gate in the side of a mountain. When he approached, it vanished. Perhaps a mage skilled in illusions or earth magic should be sent to investigate.

name: Your mage has found a miniscule crack in
description: Your mage has found a miniscule crack in a sheer cliff side, tracing the outline of a large gate. Some primordial magic is hiding it and preventing it from being opened. A laboratory is needed at the site to study this magic if it is to be dispelled.

name: A group of trolls have emerged from the
description: A group of trolls have emerged from the mountain at night, attacking the laboratory!

name: There has been a breakthrough in the stu
description: There has been a breakthrough in the studies of the gate! The magics hiding it have been thwarted. A beautiful stone gate, inlaid with golden bands and runes, has been revealed and lead into the mountain. According to the inscriptions this is the gate to the fabled Halls of the Mountain King. Will you send an army to invade his realm, or a diplomat to parlay?

name: Your men have entered the mountain, foll
description: Your men have entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. Emerging in a large chamber, they encountered a troll in strange livery, bespeaking them. ??In the name of King Underneath, I advise you to come no further. Turn back and you will know his gratitude. Persist, and you will be crushed like tender thrush-eggs under his foot!??

name: Pushing further into the mountain, your
description: Pushing further into the mountain, your army has been attacked by trolls. They are led by a huge specimen, clad in bronze armor, wearing a crown upon his head. His battle bellow puts fear into the hearts of men.[Midget Masher]
effects: code 156|1com Mountain King|addequip 1|2com War Troll|addequip 9|6d6units War Troll|6d6units Troll

name: The Troll King has been defeated and his
description: The Troll King has been defeated and his realm destroyed! In his halls were fabulous treasures gathered for hundreds of years. [Ruined Halls of the Mountain King]

name: Your servant has entered the mountain, f
description: Your servant has entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. After some time, a troll in strange livery approached. ??The King Underneath suggests a treaty! Leave these halls for good and he will share his wealth and even come to your aid if enemies threaten. Remain, and you will feel his anger!?? A mage with knowledge of the path of Earth or one skilled in illusions would perhaps be able to travel deeper without being seen. Otherwise it is probably wise to follow the heralds advice and leave the province with all your men.

name: Your servant has entered the mountain, f
description: Your servant has entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. After some time, a troll in strange livery approached. ??The King Underneath suggests a treaty! Leave these halls for good and he will share his wealth and even come to your aid if enemies threaten. Remain, and you will feel his anger!?? A mage with knowledge of the path of Earth or one skilled in illusions would perhaps be able to travel deeper without being seen. Otherwise it is probably wise to follow the heralds advice and leave the province with all your men.

description: Your cunning mage has been able to trick the guardian of the mountain and travel unseen into the depths, using the Path of Earth to blend into the rock. The treasure vault of King Kvlmu has been pilfered for some of its wealth!

name: After the recent battle, the corpse of t
description: After the recent battle, the corpse of the mage was plundered. In his pockets were found a strange object. It seems to be some kind of compass. Following its lead, your men have travelled into the mists and found a place of power. Hidden at the heart of the highlands lies a lake from which mist constantly rises. Through the veils a translucent tower can be seen. [Translucent Tower]

name: Plague is spreading among the populace.
description: Plague is spreading among the populace.

name: There are rumors of plague in a neighbor
description: There are rumors of plague in a neighboring province. People are suspicious of foreigners and trade has been hampered. Armed men could probably seal the borders, but this would further decrease commerce.

name: Plague is spreading among the populace.
description: Plague is spreading among the populace.

name: The rumors of plague seems to have been
description: The rumors of plague seems to have been false. People praise your mercy and pay offerings of thanks at the altars!

name: The plague has subsided.
description: The plague has subsided.

name: The plague is still reaping both young a
description: The plague is still reaping both young and old. Prayers for mercy are whispered at your shrines!

name: The plague is still reaping both young a
description: The plague is still reaping both young and old. Your priests preach that only more offerings and prayers can bring an end to suffering.

Perhaps it would be wise to suppress this heresy by erecting a temple of the true faith or sending priests to preach the true tenets to the people.

description: A runaway thief was slain in the fields. Where his blood soaked the earth, magical gems crystallized in the soil.

description: Some of your captive virgins are with child!

description: A swallow was seen chasing an eagle. This could be interpreted as an omen of war.

description: A fire has destroyed the arcane laboratory.

description: A heatwave has struck the land. Drought is expected

description: A hailstorm has devastated the countryside, killing cattle and shepherds.

description: Storms at sea have taken many ships lately, diminishing trade.

description: Heavy snowfalls have blocked important trade routes.

description: The wolves are hungry this winter and locals are being attacked and killed by the score.

description: The weather is getting increasingly colder and an unseasonal winter is expected.

description: The temperature has dropped considerably and blizzards have devastated the land. Many have died from starvation.

description: A hurricane has struck the land, devastating the countryside.

description: A blizzard has struck the province, killing animals and young. The heavy snowfalls hampered trade and production.

description: Insect swarms are eating the crops and annoying the populace.

name: Disease is spreading.
description: Disease is spreading.

name: The recent plague has hampered trade. Ho
description: The recent plague has hampered trade. Hopefully this will also contain the disease.

name: An unusual amount of dead rats have been
description: An unusual amount of dead rats have been found floating in the harbor.

name: A ship has come from a distant land. Aft
description: A ship has come from a distant land. After having been accepted ashore several of the crew members died with blackened limbs and lumps in their armpits. The ship has now been burnt together with the sloppy harbormaster. Hopefully it was not to late.

name: Plague!
description: Plague!

name: Plague!
description: Plague!

name: Disease is spreading.
description: Disease is spreading.

name: A cult has emerged in the wake of the re
description: A cult has emerged in the wake of the recent plague. According to its dogm disease is a blessing, for only through suffering can the holy mysteries be revealed. Perhaps it would be wise to suppress this heresy by erecting a temple of the true faith or sending priests to preach the true tenets to the people.

name: An unnatural plague has swept the provin
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since.

name: The governor of the province has died fr
description: The governor of the province has died from the plague. His successor is incompetent.

description: A new breed of mosquitoes are infesting the swamps, spreading disease in the area.

name: Miasmatic fumes are rising from the swam
description: Miasmatic fumes are rising from the swamps, spreading disease in the area.

name: A wealthy merchant suffering from the pl
description: A wealthy merchant suffering from the plague has donated all his gold to get rid of the affliction.

name: A wealthy and faithful noble has died fr
description: A wealthy and faithful noble has died from the plague. She had willed her fortunes to the temple.

name: A village succumbed to the plague is sai
description: A village succumbed to the plague is said to be haunted by the ghosts of its victims. [Haunted Village]

name: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabi
description: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabins and rotting corpses litter the landscape. People are suspicious of foreigners, which has hampered trade.

name: Bubonic plague is spreading.
description: Bubonic plague is spreading.

description: Hearing rumors of the plague, foreign merchants are avoiding the ports.

description: Plague is rampant and people are praying for mercy to the god of death!

description: Plague is rampant and people are praying for mercy!

description: A preacher has appeared.

description: Plague has struck. A rich noble commissioned a skull face, believing that by so altering his visage he would cheat death. His folly was soon apparent and the item has been acquired from his mausoleum. [Skullface]

description: A pious mage has died from disease. His arcane laboratory and his apprentice were willed to the church. [Owl Quill]

description: A sage has come to study the manifestations of the plague.

name: The locals yearn for bloody sports. The
description: The locals yearn for bloody sports. The have established an Arena to satisfy their urges. [Arena]

name: A wizard and his apprentices have forswo
description: A wizard and his apprentices have forsworn their Art and seen the path to salvation! All their belongings have been donated to the church, and the four men now serve in humble gratitude.

description: A coven of witches has been driven from the land, their belongings confiscated.

name: A cabal of sorcerers has been destroyed,
description: A cabal of sorcerers has been destroyed, their lab demolished and most of their belongings burnt. A few items were salvaged.

name: A seer has been strangled to death by an
description: A seer has been strangled to death by an angry mob after giving false prophesies of good fortune. One of his eyes looked strange and it has been transported to the capital. [Eye of the Void]

name: A former mage, having renounced his arts
description: A former mage, having renounced his arts, has devised some suits of armor to the benefit of the warriors of faith. [Mirror Armor]

name: One of your mages has consorted with a w
description: One of your mages has consorted with a witch in the woods. After an unnaturally short pregnancy, the crone gave birth to a monster, who now follows his father like a loyal dog.

name: There is war in Hell! Infernal powers be
description: There is war in Hell! Infernal powers become manifest when the conflict spills over into the realm of men.

name: The War in Hell has subsided.
description: The War in Hell has subsided.

name: Your temple has been desecrated! An acol
description: Your temple has been desecrated! An acolyte was found strung face down above the altar, the divine statues broken, your glorious visage defaced and entrails scattered in the chancel. Repairs have been costly.

description: The statues of the temple have mysteriously been turned backwards during the night, as if not wanting to look upon the altar.

description: The statues of the temple have mysteriously been turned backwards during the night, as if not wanting to look upon the altar.

description: The local ruler has employed a new jester at court.

name: The fields have been unnaturally fertile
description: The fields have been unnaturally fertile this year, yielding an extra harvest. Some say the farmers have made pacts with demons to increase their gain.

description: The fields have been unnaturally fertile this year, yielding an extra harvest. Some say the farmers have made pacts with demons to increase their gain.

name: Your mages have studied the Gate. There
description: Your mages have studied the Gate. There are three of these portals and of increasing power. When opened, travel from the realms beyond is facilitated, making it easier for demons to manifest all across the world of men. When the Second Gate opens, the lords of hell themselves may be able to manifest! The power of pure faith may be able to close the gates, or perhaps a master of blood magic could be able to control them. If further studied, some insights into the workings of the nether realms may be gained. However, it may be dangerous to linger near.

name: Your ardent priests have been able to sw
description: Your ardent priests have been able to sway some of the lost into the fold of true faith. The sinners have repented and confessed. Former cult members have revealed the secret location of the summoning circle where the cult plans to conduct their black magic. It would be wise to swiftly send some armed men to deal with the leaders before they try something desperate.

description: Your blood mage has been able to infiltrate the Cult and lead your men to its secret hideout. A cabal of sorcerers was caught in the act of human sacrifice! Gathering in the basement of a town house, they were interrupted when trying to summon a greater demon from beyond. A battle ensued! [Brazen Vessel]

name: A warlock has been caught and his blood
description: A warlock has been caught and his blood slaves liberated. When pressured, the man revealed the whereabouts the demon-worshipping cabal that is probably the center of the Cult. At least a handful of men will be needed to find and deal with it.

name: One of your mages has found a blasphemou
description: One of your mages has found a blasphemous book hidden at the home of a suspected Cult member. After reading it, the pages smoldered.

description: An angel of the host has descended to aid in the fight against evil!

name: Your informants claim that one of the lo
description: Your informants claim that one of the local nobles is involved in Cult worship. Rumors say he never leaves his house at daytime. A mage skilled in blood magic may be able to find proof of his involvement in the deviant practices, or perhaps your churchmen may be able to find out more.

name: A pious servant of the suspected noblema
description: A pious servant of the suspected nobleman has confessed that unholy rites are indeed taking place at his manor. The man is willing to lead your men there and suggests to bring a good number of them, for his lord is unnaturally strong and has loyal men about him.

name: A corpse has been found, drained of bloo
description: A corpse has been found, drained of blood.

description: Your blood mage has found signs of a demonic presence in the nobleman's manor. The place is well guarded, so a fair number of men will be needed to make an arrest.

description: More cattle have been killed. People are blaming the lords for not providing safety.

name: Dark tales are told in the inns borderin
description: Dark tales are told in the inns bordering the wasteland. They speak of a previous age when this land was verdant and its cities the envy of kings. One man ruled the emerging civilization. When nearing the end of his days, he turned to Dark Arts to prolong his life and his rule. This corrupted the king's soul and in the end he used the lifeforce of all his subjects and that of the fertile land itself to avoid death. The kingdom was laid to waste, its soil barren and its people destroyed, their bleached bones littering the land. Some say his magic still lingers. Some say the ruins deep in the wasteland are no longer silent and that the lamentation of its long lost inhabitants can be heard faintly when the desert wind blows from the east.

name: The Evil that once laid waste to this la
description: The Evil that once laid waste to this land has awoken! From his dark fortress at the heart of the wasteland, the Necromancer sends forth his minions to claim the land. Only the strength of faith will hold his dark power at bay! [Necromancer's Lair]

name: A curse has been put upon all living! Ca
description: A curse has been put upon all living! Cattle die, their bellies bloated like the victims of famine. The fruits of birth are stillborn. Crops wither in the fields, leaving nothing but ash. People cannot tolerate to live in such a place and have emigrated in large numbers. Many have died prematurely, their years of health seemingly vanished overnight! [Withered Land]

description: The Necromancer has sucked the force of life from a whole land! Strengthened by that unwholesome power he may rise to challenge the gods!

description: With the aid of a local pathfinder, the outskirts of the deep forest has been searched. A grisly heap of small carcasses has been found. Perhaps the remains of rabbits eaten by a wolf?

description: The Lamia Queen has been defeated! Within her abode were found forgotten treasures and the belongings of her victims.

name: Your agent has found hints in local tale
description: Your agent has found hints in local tales and legends of similar events in a time long gone. Supposedly, the queen of this land lost all her children to evil sorcery. In her grief, she went mad and commanded her subjects to gather the infants of the land for her to feed upon. The truth of these stories is questionable, as they are mostly used to scare children into obedience.

description: Tensions are rising over the practices of the Ravens Vale Seraphs. There has been manifestations of civil unrest in the capital. Only the wisdom of an Eagle King will calm the opposing factions.

description: The Caelian Seraphs have brought a leader of Ravens Vale to court, sentencing him to exile. This has demonstrated Caelian supremacy and removed a quarrelsome voice among the Harab Seraphs.

description: The mere presence of a descendant of the Yazatas is enough to placate the agitated realm.

name: The presence of a descendant of the Yaza
description: The presence of a descendant of the Yazatas has placated the capital, but dissent remains. Many of the Raptorians feel their clan has been wronged by the courts lately when disputes have been settled to the advantage of the Airyas.

name: A forgotten tome has been found at the l
description: A forgotten tome has been found at the library. Hidden in a secret repository and warded by magical glyphs, it was probably meant never to be opened. Alas, one of your mages could not resist the temptation. [Library]

name: Tomb of ice appears in mountain province
description: Tomb of ice appears in mountain province HIDDEN. [Tomb of Ice]

name: City of the Ancient appears HIDDEN. [Cit
description: City of the Ancient appears HIDDEN. [City of the Ancients]

name: The City of the Ancients has been found!
description: The City of the Ancients has been found! Within its legendary walls are secrets long forgotten and treasures worthy of kings! However, to find these secrets the ruins must be entered by one brave enough to face the perils within. [City of the Ancients]

name: While exploring the ancient ruins, your
description: While exploring the ancient ruins, your servants have found an ancient scriptorium, still containing crumbling clay tablets filled with ancient lore. A sage would be able to gain much knowledge from such a wealth of documents, if allowed time and facilities for research. Lacking one learned in dead languages, one of your mages might suffice. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: A sage has come to study at the Scriptor
description: A sage has come to study at the Scriptorium. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: A Lore Master and his apprentice have co
description: A Lore Master and his apprentice have come to study at the Ancient Scriptorium. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: Your sage has studied the ancient texts
description: Your sage has studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. They speak of a long forgotten age, when giants walked the earth and fought battles of such magnitude that was never seen again in the world of mortals. It seems the long dead inhabitants of this city were peaceful farmers worshipping their benevolent Lord in peace and piety. Their knowledge of science, astrology and agriculture were advanced, drawing the envy of rivaling nations. From the far north came frost giants, pillaging and destroying the fertile lands with their hatred and bitterly cold winters. Their civilization threatened with destruction, the elders of the city turned to powerful magic, summoning dragons to fight the intruders. The leader of the enemy giants was killed, but still the city fell, its splendour torn down, its glorious temples destroyed and its elders beheaded in the square. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. Your servant suggests further studies may yield more details of the history of the city.

name: Your Lore Master has studied the ancient
description: Your Lore Master has studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. Your servant suggests further studies may yield more details of the history of the city.

The leader of the enemy giants was killed, but still the city fell, its splendour torn down, its glorious temples destroyed, its elders beheaded in the square. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. Your servant suggests further studies may yield more details of the history of the city.

name: Further information on the events leadin
description: Further information on the events leading to the downfall of the ancient city has been deciphered. It seems the leader of the northmen was mortally wounded and incarcerated in a tomb of ice. It was supposedly constructed somewhere in a nearby mountain range where perpetual cold would preserve the giant warleader for eternity.

name: An expedition into the mountains has loc
description: An expedition into the mountains has located a cave opening hidden at the bottom of a rift in the great glacier crowning the mighty mountain peaks. It is sealed with huge slabs of cut stone bearing runes of frost. A sage or a powerful mage versed in the arts of water and frost magic may be able to decipher the runes, or perhaps an earth mage could somehow open the way.

name: An expedition into the mountains has loc
description: An expedition into the mountains has located a cave opening hidden at the bottom of a rift in the great glacier crowning the mighty mountain peaks. It is sealed with huge slabs of cut stone bearing runes of frost. A sage or a powerful mage versed in the arts of water and frost magic may be able to decipher the runes, or perhaps an earth mage could somehow open the way.

name: The runes have been deciphered and their
description: The runes have been deciphered and their magic released, opening a way into the mountain. Following the ice-covered tunnel, a huge circular chamber has been reached. In its center rests a large sarcophagus of ice. Within lies an ancient warrior of a giant race, his battle wounds still fresh. Will you continue to plunder the treasures of the tomb, or let your mage investigate the magic of this place? [Tomb of Ice]

name: The runes have been deciphered and their
description: The runes have been deciphered and their magic released, opening a way into the mountain. Following the ice-covered tunnel, a huge circular chamber has been reached. name: The Tomb of Ice has been plundered! When
description: The Tomb of Ice has been plundered! When his rime hauberk was stripped from the ancient warrior giant, the corpse started bleeding profusely from its wounds and soon lay drained. Within the tomb were found great treasures. [Rime Hauberk]

name: Your mage has investigated the magic of
description: Your mage has investigated the magic of the Tomb of Ice. It seems the sarcophagus and the armor of the dead giant is enchanted with powerful magic, preserving him through the millennia and even slowly pulling his soul from the realm of the dead back into the flesh. The makers of the tomb seem to have planned ahead, for among its treasures are inscribed slabs of stone describing the ritual that will bring the ancient war-leader to life once more! Will you continue on this perilous path or rather withdraw, plundering the tomb of its riches?

name: As a master of all forgotten languages,
description: As a master of all forgotten languages, you have swiftly studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. They speak of a distant age, when giants walked the earth and fought battles of such magnitude that was never seen again in the world of mortals. It seems the long dead inhabitants of this city were peaceful farmers worshipping their benevolent Lord in peace and piety. Their knowledge of science, astrology and agriculture were advanced, drawing the envy of rivaling nations. From the far north came frost giants, pillaging and destroying the fertile lands with their hatred and bitterly cold winters. Their civilization threatened with destruction, the elders of the city turned to powerful magic, summoning dragons to fight the intruders. The leader of the enemy giants was killed, but still the city fell, its splendour torn down, its glorious temples destroyed, its elders beheaded in the square. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. You surmise this could be an account of a war between the earlier civilizations of Niefelheim and Ur. Notably, the capital of the latter was known as the First City. Further studies may yield more details.

name: There has been a theft in the scriptoriu
description: There has been a theft in the scriptorium! Several interesting volumes have disappeared. Among them were some recent translations of the history of the city.

name: Accounts from the fall of the city have
description: Accounts from the fall of the city have been found. According to one author, the attackers sought to claim some mysterious power located in the High Temple. Apparently the city was besieged and its population starved. A grisly passage describes how a zealous contingent of the temple guard began feeding upon the dead to preserve their strength for the final battle, described elsewhere by a witness: 'Without rest they fought, the chosen of the Lord, in defence of his wellspring of life, the source of Abundance. Red did it flow at the end, its purity wasted, all hope forfeit under the sword of the cold-bringers.' Perhaps the site of the temple can be found by searching the city ruins.

name: The ruins of the High Temple have been f
description: The ruins of the High Temple have been found! Within its broken vaults is a wellspring of clear water, bursting from the earth. From the crypts beneath, the guardians of the temple rise to defend it once more... [Wellspring of Abundance]

name: A whisper of falsehood and wickedness ha
description: A whisper of falsehood and wickedness has swept across the land. The Druj, People of the Lie, those of evil intentions, are called forth to spread the will of the destructive spirit. Rebellions, murder and thefts cause unrest and strife across the province. In its wake came the Daevas, demonic beings that thrive on destruction, and slaughter begun.

description: A pack of sea dogs is roving the coastal lands.

description: Lately, strange howling has been heard along the coast. People have disappeared and locals are upset. Perhaps one of your commanders should investigate.

name: Tracks on the shore reveal that groups o
description: Tracks on the shore reveal that groups of creatures emerge from the sea at night-time and roam the coast, probably returning at dawn. A patrolling force may be able to intercept them.

name: Some tracks were found at the shore, rev
description: Some tracks were found at the shore, revealing that some kind of creatures emerge from the sea to roam the coast. Unfortunately, your men were set upon by a pack of these monsters! [Bottle of Living Water]

description: A smugglers cave was found, its contents claimed by the treasury.

description: The sea-creatures have been intercepted! The pack is lead on a frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: Winter has come, putting an end to the s
description: Winter has come, putting an end to the strange occurrences plaguing the coastal province.

name: More of the strange howling has been hea

name: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settl
description: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settlements, lead on their frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settl
description: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settlements, lead on their frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: The province governor has sent word to t
description: The province governor has sent word to the capital. The inhabitants in one of the secluded fishing villages along the coast seem to be engaged in smuggling. However, all attempts to reveal this have failed and she suspects the smugglers have informants among the province officials. The governor therefore asks for aid from the capital. Perhaps someone should be sent to investigate.

name: There has been an assassination attempt!
description: There has been an assassination attempt!

name: Your agent sends a disturbing report fro
description: Your agent sends a disturbing report from the coastal village. Some of the inhabitants are afflicted with a deforming disease. They walk hunchbacked and with a wobbling gait, eyes bulging from the strange fever besetting them. This has led them to seek aid with alien gods, secret worship supposedly taking place on a small island off the coast.

name: When investigating the island, your agen
description: When investigating the island, your agent was attacked!

name: The small island has been located. A bas
description: The small island has been located. A basalt statue of hideous visage was found in a cove, with signs of ritual worship nearby. Someone may be able to observe the activities secretly. You could also send priests to bring the lost flock into the fold or armed men to deal with this heresy by force. [Statue of Hideous Visage]

name: At the night of the dark moon, the villa
description: At the night of the dark moon, the villagers congregated at the basalt statue, engaging in guttural prayer and hideous chanting. As the rite progressed, they were joined by deformed men crawling from the sea, led by a robed creature with tentacles sprouting from its face. The strange ritual culminated in the summoning of a monstrosity from the void!

name: The village elders have approached your
description: The village elders have approached your commander, offering a deal. If you let them continue their practices in peace, they will provide a tribute of youths touched by the blessing of the sea.

name: From the secluded village emerges monstr
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.
