name: You have accepted the offer of tribute.
description: You have accepted the offer of tribute. Some hybrid servants will be available each month. [Secluded Village]

name: Your priests have been able to convince
description: Your priests have been able to convince a majority of the people living in the corrupted fishing-village to follow the true faith. The heretics have been banished or killed and your dominion rules supreme! The province governor has funded the building of a new temple.

name: There has been an assassination attempt!
description: There has been an assassination attempt!

name: From the secluded village emerges monstr
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.

name: People have left the land, disgusted by
description: People have left the land, disgusted by the heretical practices in some of the coastal villages. [Secluded Village]

name: Your agent has been attacked!
description: Your agent has been attacked!

name: Your dominion is not strong enough to co
description: Your dominion is not strong enough to counter the heretic influences through prayer and sermons!

name: At the night of the dark moon, the villa
description: At the night of the dark moon, the villagers congregated at the basalt statue, engaging in guttural prayer and hideous chanting. As the rite progressed, they were joined by deformed men crawling from the sea, led by a robed creature with tentacles sprouting from its face. The creature beckoned your servant, who eagerly joined the chanting. Afterwards a proposal was made: Leave the village to its own affairs and let the creature claim some souls now and then from the coastal settlements. In return he will bind an entity from the void to serve.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.
effects: code 234|nation -2|1unit Thing That Should Not Be|incdom -7

name: People have disappeared from the coastal
description: People have disappeared from the coastal villages or while traveling the roads between them. Strange creatures are rumored to haunt the area. Some have gone mad after seeing them.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.

name: When refused, the starspawn broke the pe
description: When refused, the starspawn broke the peace of parlay and attacked! Now, the only option is to use force to stop the unwholesome activities in the village. [Eye of the Void]

name: From the secluded village emerges monstr
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.

name: Your men have gained information on the
description: Your men have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. A thorough search by a large force of armed men may finally bring these criminals to justice.

name: The local rebellion has reached its clim
description: The local rebellion has reached its climax. Riots are erupting everywhere! The few loyal men in the defence have been slaughtered by angry kinsmen and an all-out attack has been coordinated by the leaders of the resistance!

name: This spring, a wonderful undine was seen
description: This spring, a wonderful undine was seen dancing in the waves, spreading joy and laughter in the land.

name: Magical runes on the Throne of Elements
description: Magical runes on the Throne of Elements have been deciphered. There seems to be some kind of wards shielding the throne. Your advisors suggest further studies may be wise before claiming it. [The Throne of Elements]

name: Ancient lore concerning the creation of
description: Ancient lore concerning the creation of the Throne has been found among the learned of this land. The Throne was created by four arch-mages and imbued by the emanations of the Pantokrator. On their path to ascendancy, each of the four  mages founded an order whose purpose was to protect the throne, so that one unworthy would not sit upon it. The runes on the throne are wardings of obscure purpose. There is one ward for each of the four elements.

name: You ignore the warding runes and sit upo
description: You ignore the warding runes and sit upon the Throne of Elements! A weak trembling is all that is felt from its surface. Probably, the ancient magics have faltered in the presence of your powerful aura. [The Throne of Elements]

name: With barely a thought you utilize the po
description: With barely a thought you utilize the power of astral magic to unravel the elegant but insufficient wards that surround the Throne. [The Throne of Elements]

name: The runes of the Throne have been distur
description: The runes of the Throne have been disturbed by the investigations, but there is no sign of any overt effects...

name: It seems the wards can be dispelled by s
description: It seems the wards can be dispelled by someone well versed in the corresponding element. According to ancient texts it must be done in a certain order, 'like the passing of the seasons'. There are also hints in local lore that the guardians of the throne will only appear during springtime.

name: A master of air magic has unraveled the
description: A master of air magic has unraveled the first rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: Spring has come, and yet the magic wards
description: Spring has come, and yet the magic wards on the throne have not been broken. This bodes ill!

name: A master of fire magic has unraveled the
description: A master of fire magic has unraveled the second rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: A master of earth magic has unraveled th
description: A master of earth magic has unraveled the third rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: A master of water magic has unraveled th
description: A master of water magic has unraveled the last rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: Four robed men have appeared in the prov
description: Four robed men have appeared in the province. They are masters of their respective orders, sworn to protect the Throne of Elements. You have proven worthy, and they will now serve your will.
effects: code 0|nation -2|1com Wind Master|0x6A00 1|1com Adept of Pyriphlegeton|0x6A00 0|1com Wizard|0x6A00 3|0x6A00 3|1com Ice Druid|0x6A00 2

name: A violent thunderstorm has struck! From
description: A violent thunderstorm has struck! From the roiling sky a host of magical beings sweep down towards the Throne. They are led by a robed man. [Winged Helmet]

description: Temperature has dropped dramatically during a snow storm. In its wake comes a Frost Mage and his host of magical beings, making an attempt to wrest the Throne of Elements from your grasp! [Ice Pebble Staff]

description: The guardians of the Throne have been defeated!

name: Prepare Necromancer event. HIDDEN. [The
description: Prepare Necromancer event. HIDDEN. [The Throne of Death]

name: A helpful necromancer has appeared, conf
description: A helpful necromancer has appeared, confessing that you are the true Lord of the Afterlife and that none other should sit upon the Throne of Death! He claims to have secret knowledge of its workings and that if brought to the Throne, he will invoke its power in your name.

name: The Necromancer has been brought to the
description: The Necromancer has been brought to the Throne of Death! A lab will be needed if he is to work his sorcery.

name: The Necromancer has studied the inscript
description: The Necromancer has studied the inscriptions and fittings on the Throne, attuning himself to its magic...

name: The Necromancer has invoked the power of
description: The Necromancer has invoked the power of the Throne!

name: A mortal has invoked the power of the Th
description: A mortal has invoked the power of the Throne of Death! This is clearly a violation of the Celestial Laws.

name: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The N
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

description: The Necromancer has bound the spirits of the land in a pact. They will now rise to defend the Throne of Death! [Spirit Pact]

description: The Necromancer has grown in power! His cackling laughter can be heard by anyone approaching the lab.

description: A mortal vessel cannot hold such power as resides in the Throne of Death!

description: By the workings of the Necromancer, some of the power of the Throne of Death has been released into the mortal realm. Now, even the souls of the living has to answer its call!

description: The veil to the Shade Lands has grown thin by the unlawful use of dark magic, disturbing its residents.

description: The Dust priest has summoned monsters of the desert to his aid.

description: The Dust King and his High Priest have been defeated! In the Crypt, ancient treasures were found. [Skull of Fire]

description: A large pack of werewolves have attacked!

description: It is whispered that an old curse has awoken, calling those affected into the wilderness at full moon.

description: It is whispered that an old curse has awoken, calling those affected into the wilderness at full moon.

name: Lately, dogs have gone rabid and fled. A
description: Lately, dogs have gone rabid and fled. A pack has now reappeared, mixed with more sinister creatures...

name: One of your commanders has been attacked
description: One of your commanders has been attacked by a rabid dog.

name: The wild beasts have grown in number lat
description: The wild beasts have grown in number lately, coming near settlements and harassing travelers. Now a pack of wolves have attacked one of the villages, forcing the local defence to intervene. Some peasants have joined the soldiers.

name: The Tainted one has attracted attention
description: The Tainted one has attracted attention from otherworldly powers.

name: The Taint corrupts the body and mind! On
description: The Taint corrupts the body and mind! One of your commanders has developed strange cravings.

name: The Tainted one has attracted attention
description: The Tainted one has attracted attention from otherworldly powers.

name: The practice of blood hunting has brough
description: The practice of blood hunting has brought the Taint upon one of your servants.

name: A mob has formed to oppose your blood hu
description: A mob has formed to oppose your blood hunters!

name: Opposition towards the ongoing blood hun
description: Opposition towards the ongoing blood hunting has provoked an attack on your servant!

name: There is opposition towards the ongoing
description: There is opposition towards the ongoing blood hunting. Someone has hired an assassin to get rid of your servant.

name: Your servant encountered a local sect of
description: Your servant encountered a local sect of fanatics. Their doctrine is to abstain from all pleasures of the flesh.

name: While blood hunting, your servant stumbl
description: While blood hunting, your servant stumbled upon a remote village where inhabitants have shielded innocent virgins from being caught.

name: When the daughter of one of the locals w
description: When the daughter of one of the locals was climed for the blood slave dungeons, her mother put a curse upon your servants!

name: One of your blood hunters foolishly trie
description: One of your blood hunters foolishly tried to summon a demon for his own gain.

name: One of your blood hunters has attracted
description: One of your blood hunters has attracted the attention of a smallish demon who now follows his new master around. [Imp Familiar]

name: A rich merchant tried to bribe one of yo
description: A rich merchant tried to bribe one of your blood hunters, seeking to save his daughter from paying the blood tax. Your servant proved his loyalty and has delivered both the girl and the gold to the capital.

name: One of your blood hunters has become mor
description: One of your blood hunters has become more attuned to the sanguine magic.

name: One of your blood hunters has used some
description: One of your blood hunters has used some of the virgins to make a contract with demons. [Lifelong Protection]

name: War has broken out among the lords of th
description: War has broken out among the lords of the land. There is great turmoil and a large part of the population has been killed or fled.

name: A naiad court has been traveling through
description: A naiad court has been traveling through the seas, celebrating summer. Growth and luck have increased but frolicking peasants have left the kelp untended, causing a fall in productivity.

name: An Ill Moon rises! People whisper in fea
description: An Ill Moon rises! People whisper in fear of the transforming curse of Lycanthropy. Wolves prowl the night, closer to the settlements of men than normal. Dogs go rabid, howling and barking madly at the baleful light in the sky.

name: Reset Ill moon. HIDDEN
description: Reset Ill moon. HIDDEN

name: PLACEHOLDER.
description: PLACEHOLDER.

name: Wolves have been heard, howling at the m
description: Wolves have been heard, howling at the moon.

name: Wolf/werewolf attack, no warning. HIDDEN
description: Wolf/werewolf attack, no warning. HIDDEN

name: A group of tribesmen have attacked the p
description: A group of tribesmen have attacked the province! Their leader seems to be under the influence of the Ill Moon. [Lychantropos' Amulet]

description: A group of tribesmen have joined you! Their leader seems to be under the influence of the Ill Moon. [Lychantropos' Amulet]

name: Old tunnels dating from the time of the
description: Old tunnels dating from the time of the first colony have been found. They lead deep into the earth but are blocked by massive amounts of ice. [Lake Urmia]

name: You leave the ancient tunnels alone. Bes
description: You leave the ancient tunnels alone. Best not to disturb their secrets.

name: The ice blocking the tunnels seems to ha
description: The ice blocking the tunnels seems to have magical properties. It would probably take a period of prolonged heat along with fire magic to melt it.

name: Your scholars have found records from th
description: Your scholars have found records from the First Turan War, which denotes the years after the incursion of the caelians. It seems that the caelian seraphs located an Abysian temple of Fire hidden deep in the earth and used powerful magic to seal the passages leading to it.

name: A mage skilled in the path of fire has a
description: A mage skilled in the path of fire has arrived in the province. Will flames be able to melt the ice in the ancient tunnels?

name: Your mage has utilized the power of fire
description: Your mage has utilized the power of fire to melt the ice sealing the tunnels. Some ice has been removed, but not sufficiently to make meaningful progress. If the land itself was warmer, the heat of summer could perhaps be channeled into the tunnels to break the magical ice.

name: You have utilized the power of fire to m
description: You have utilized the power of fire to melt the ice sealing the tunnels. Some ice has been melted, but not sufficiently to make meaningful progress. If the land itself was warmer, the heat of summer could perhaps be channeled into the tunnels to break the magical ice.

name: The warmth of the land has been channele
description: The warmth of the land has been channeled into the tunnels, melting the masses of ice. Ancient passages lead into the depth of the earth. Still, some ice remains. Also, the runes of warding inscribed on some of the walls of the tunnels have been deciphered. It seems the magic ice was not aimed at keeping out intruders from the tunnels, but rather at containing something within! Perhaps it would be unwise to melt the ice further...

name: The melting ice has formed into an eleme
description: The melting ice has formed into an elemental! This must be the remnants of some old defensive magic.

name: The melting ice has formed into an eleme
description: The melting ice has formed into an elemental, attacking the intruder! This must be the remnants of some old defensive magic.

name: The ice has been melted and parts of the
description: The ice has been melted and parts of the complex network of previously ice-filled tunnels explored. At some places there are wrecked bodies of winged beings, probably caelians. The remains bear traces of horrible burn-wounds. Strangely, there are no abysian bodies to be found. Will you take the time to carefully explore the tunnels or continue as fast as possible into the depths of the earth? Your scouts report there seems to be a way downwards, from which flows warm air.

name: A forgotten treasure vault has been foun
description: A forgotten treasure vault has been found in the tunnels! [Charcoal Shield]

name: A magic item has been found in the tunne
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Ice Pebble Staff]

name: A magic item has been found in the tunne
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Frost Brand]

name: A magic item has been found in the tunne
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Rime Hauberk]

name: A nest of Cave Grubs has been exposed!
description: A nest of Cave Grubs has been exposed!

name: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to c
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Black Steel Full Plate]

name: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to c
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have now strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Spell Focus]

name: Your men advance into the depths. Rough
description: Your men advance into the depths. Rough cut passages lead leagues down into the crust of the earth. They end by the shores of a massive lake of magma and by those shores stand an ancient altar, eroded by the workings of time. If once again consecrated, perhaps it could be put to use again. [Magma Cave]

name: Your men advance into the depths. Rough
description: Your men advance into the depths. Rough cut passages lead leagues down into the crust of the earth. They end by the shores of a massive lake of magma. By those shores stand an ancient altar, eroded by the workings of time. If once again consecrated, perhaps it could be put to use again. [Magma Cave]

name: Sunken into the magma, a treasure chest
description: Sunken into the magma, a treasure chest of enchanted stone has been found and skillfully retrieved! [Rod of the Phoenix]

name: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to c
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have now strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Horror Helmet]

name: The Altar has been hallowed once more! [
description: The Altar has been hallowed once more! [Altar of Catharsis]

name: Only a priest can bless the altar.
description: Only a priest can bless the altar.

name: Traces of sinister magic have been found
description: Traces of sinister magic have been found emanating from the altar.

name: Old records from the time of the first c
description: Old records from the time of the first colony have been studied and compared to new findings at the site. It seems that the altar is older than previously thought, perhaps even predating the arrival of the Abysians! It was apparently dedicated to the Purifyig Flame. If a hidden altar of Catharsis since before the pollution of the Sacred Flame was found by the Abysian settlers, could this have been a reason for the Caelian campaign and the Turan wars? Would it be possible to rekindle the flame that was thought corrupted?

name: A being of flame has been summoned!
description: A being of flame has been summoned!

name: YOU DARE KINDLE THE FLAME THAT IS MINE,
description: YOU DARE KINDLE THE FLAME THAT IS MINE, AND MINE ALONE!? ...it seems the fire was not pure after all! A dark flame rises to punish your insolence... [Lantern Shield]

description: Anthrax has been banished!

description: Hearing rumors of the sealed tunnels, a fire mage has come from afar to pledge himself to your cause and investigate the tunnels. [Dragon Sceptre]
